#########################################################################
#  Germany Events
#########################################################################
#  Re-occupation of the Rhineland - HUMAN ONLY
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2000
	random = no
	country = GER
	trigger = {
		ai = no
		NOT = {
			war = { country = GER country = FRA }
			alliance = { country = GER country = FRA }
		}
		garrison = { country = GER province = 75 size = 1 }
	}

	name = "EVT_2000_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2000_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "Rhineland"

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 }
		command = { type = money value = 500 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 50 }
		command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = 10 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = GER value = 5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -15 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = BEL value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = HOL value = -5 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2060 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2061 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = trigger which = 51 } # UK Gears up for war
		command = { type = trigger which = 52 } # France Gears up for war
	}
}

	country = ENG

	name = EVT_51_NAME
	desc = EVT_51_DESC
	picture = "factory"
	style = 0

	# Triggered by German events
#	trigger = {										# BHT1.5 撤销
#		NOT = {										# BHT1.5 撤销

#		}											# BHT1.5 撤销
#	}												# BHT1.5 撤销

	action_a = {
		name = OK
		command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = 10 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 15 }
	}
}

		}
	}

	name = "EVT_1110R_NAME"
	desc = "URGE_RHINELAND"
	picture = "great_war_manifestion"
	style = 0
	persistent = yes

	offset = 45
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME1110A"
		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
	}
}

#  Re-occupation of the Rhineland - AI ONLY
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2060
	random = no
	country = GER
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		NOT = {
			war = { country = GER country = FRA }
			alliance = { country = GER country = FRA }
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_2000_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2000_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "Rhineland"

	date = { day = 6 month = march year = 1936 }

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 }
		command = { type = money value = 500 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 50 }
		command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = 10 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = GER value = 5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -15 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = BEL value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = HOL value = -5 }
		command = { type = ai which = "switch/GER_Rhine.ai" }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2000 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2061 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = trigger which = 51 } # UK Gears up for war
		command = { type = trigger which = 52 } # France Gears up for war
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Anti-Comintern Pact
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 71
	random = no
	country = GER

	name = EVT_71_NAME
	desc = EVT_71_DESC
	picture = "anti_comitern_pact"
	style = 0

	trigger = {
		exists = JAP
		exists = ITA
		exists = SOV
		random = 5
		NOT = {
			war = { country = GER country = ITA }
			war = { country = GER country = JAP }
			war = { country = JAP country = ITA }
			alliance = { country = GER country = SOV }
			alliance = { country = JAP country = SOV }
			alliance = { country = ITA country = SOV }
		}
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1937 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 90
		name = EVT_71_ACTA
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -10 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 72 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 73 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 4
		name = EVT_71_ACTB
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -10 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 72 } # Italy only
	}
	action_c = {
		ai_chance = 3
		name = EVT_71_ACTC
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -10 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 73 } # Japan only
	}
	action_d = {
		ai_chance = 3
		name = EVT_71_ACTD
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -1 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Tri-Partite Pact
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 74
	random = no
	country = GER

	name = EVT_74_NAME
	desc = EVT_74_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "tripartite"

	trigger = {
		control = { province = 56 data = GER }
		exists = JAP
		exists = ITA
		exists = SOV
		NOT = {
			war = { country = GER country = ITA }
			war = { country = GER country = JAP }
			war = { country = JAP country = ITA }
			alliance = { country = GER country = ENG }
			alliance = { country = GER country = SOV }
			alliance = { country = ITA country = ENG }
			alliance = { country = ITA country = SOV }
			alliance = { country = JAP country = ENG }
			alliance = { country = JAP country = SOV }
		}
		random = 5
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1939 }
	offset = 6
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1945 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 90
		name = EVT_74_ACTA
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -10 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 75 value = 1 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 76 value = 2 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 3
		name = EVT_71_ACTC
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -10 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 75 value = 1 } # Japan only
	}
	action_c = {
		ai_chance = 4
		name = EVT_71_ACTB
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -10 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 76 value = 1 } # Italy only
	}
	action_d = {
		ai_chance = 3
		name = EVT_71_ACTD
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -1 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 75
	random = no
	country = JAP

	name = EVT_75_NAME
	desc = EVT_75_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "tripartite"

	# Triggered by German event 74

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 97
		name = EVT_75_ACTA
		command = { type = money value = 10 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = AST value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = NZL value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = 10 }
		command = { type = setflag which = JAPtripartite }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 3
		name = EVT_75_ACTB
		command = { type = money value = -10 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -1 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Anschluss of Austria (Edited by Civdemof，兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2020
	random = no
	country = GER
	trigger = {
		event = 40043 # MIH event 德奥协议 (by Civdemof)
		exists = AUS
		atwar = no
		NOT = {
			atwar = AUS # Austria is not at war
			alliance = { country = AUS country = SOV }
			alliance = { country = AUS country = ENG }
			alliance = { country = AUS country = GER }

		}
	}
	name = "EVT_2020_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2020_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "anchsluss"

	date = { day = 1 month = march year = 1938 } # Real Date: March 12
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 12 month = march year = 1940 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2020A" # Press for Anschluss
		ai_chance = 100
		command = { type = addcore which = 373 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 377 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 461 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 460 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 462 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 463 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 464 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 465 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 3186 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = addcore which = 3187 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = addcore which = 3188 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = addcore which = 3189 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = addcore which = 4085 } # 完整地图新增
		command = { type = addcore which = 3190 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = addcore which = 3191 } # BHT1.5

		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = CZE value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = HUN value = -5 }

		command = { type = belligerence which = GER value = 5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = democratic value = -1 }

#		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2110 }
#		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2111 }
#		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2112 }
#		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2113 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2100 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 51 } # UK Gears up for war
		command = { type = trigger which = 52 } # France Gears up for war
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2020B" # Do not create more tension
		ai_chance = 0
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = AUS value = 30 }
		command = { type = relation which = HUN value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = 10 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = GER value = -2 }

		command = { type = Sleepleader which = 544 }
		command = { type = Sleepleader which = 545 }
		command = { type = Sleepleader which = 546 }
		command = { type = Sleepleader which = 547 }
		command = { type = Sleepleader which = 548 }
		command = { type = Sleepleader which = 549 }
		command = { type = Sleepleader which = 550 }
		command = { type = Sleepleader which = 551 }
		command = { type = Sleepleader which = 552 }

#########################################################################
#  The Treaty of Munich (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2030
	random = no
	country = GER
	trigger = {
		atwar = no
		exists = CZE
		OR = {
			control = { province = 467 data = CZE }
			control = { province = 466 data = CZE }
			control = { province = 471 data = CZE }
			control = { province = 472 data = CZE }
			control = { province = 3163 data = CZE } # BHT1.5
			control = { province = 3165 data = CZE } # BHT1.5
			control = { province = 3169 data = CZE } # BHT1.5
			control = { province = 3170 data = CZE } # BHT1.5
		}
		NOT = {
			war = { country = CZE country = GER }
			alliance = { country = CZE country = GER }
#			alliance = { country = CZE country = ENG }
#			alliance = { country = CZE country = SOV }
			ispuppet = GER
			puppet = { country = CZE country = GER }
		}
	}
	name = "EVT_2030_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2030_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "Munich"

	date = { day = 29 month = september year = 1938 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2030A" # Demand Sudetenland!
		ai_chance = 100
		command = { type = addcore which = 467 } # 5 Sudetenland provinces
		command = { type = addcore which = 466 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 471 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 472 }
#		command = { type = addcore which = 474 }  # BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = addcore which = 3163 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = addcore which = 3165 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = addcore which = 3169 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = addcore which = 3170 } # BHT1.5
#		command = { type = addcore which = 3171 }
#		command = { type = addcore which = 3172 }
#		command = { type = addcore which = 3173 }
#		command = { type = addcore which = 3174 }
#		command = { type = addcore which = 3175 }		
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = CZE value = -20 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = GER value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 3 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 51 } # UK Gears up for war
		command = { type = trigger which = 52 } # France Gears up for war
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2200 } # CZE
    }
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2030B" # Leave well enough alone
		ai_chance = 0
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = CZE value = 20 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = GER value = -2 }
	}
}

		command = { type = armamentminister which = 24070 }
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 24087 }
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 24104 }

		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 24138 }
		command = { type = chiefofair which = 24144 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2004 } # GER
	}

	}

#########################################################################
#  The End of Czechoslovakia (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2040
	random = no
	country = GER

	trigger = {
		event = 2003 # German event signalling annexation of Sudetenland
		event = 2511 # BHT1.5 The First Vienna Diktat - Czechoslovakia folds under German duress
		exists = CZE
		NOT = {	
			ispuppet = CZE
			exists = SLO
			alliance = { country = CZE country = GER }
#			alliance = { country = CZE country = ENG }
			alliance = { country = CZE country = SOV }
			war = { country = CZE country = GER }
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_2040_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2040_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "czechs_annexed"

	date = { day = 14 month = march year = 1939 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2040A" # Install Tiso in Slovakia
		ai_chance = 95
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -80 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -80 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = POL value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = HUN value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -3 } # new for 1.3
		command = { type = belligerence which = GER value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 470 } # The rest of the Czech Republic
		command = { type = addcore which = 468 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 469 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 475 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 474 }  # BHT1.5
		command = { type = addcore which = 3164 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = addcore which = 3166 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = addcore which = 3168 } # BHT1.5
    command = { type = addcore which = 3167 } # 伊钦		
		command = { type = trigger which = 2201 } # CZE
		command = { type = trigger which = 51 } # UK Gears up for war
		command = { type = trigger which = 52 } # France Gears up for war
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2040B" # Partition Czecho-Slovakia with Hungary
		ai_chance = 4
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -100 }	# increased for 1.3
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -100 }	# increased for 1.3
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -10 }	# increased for 1.3
		command = { type = relation which = POL value = -15 }	# increased for 1.3
		command = { type = relation which = HUN value = 20 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -4 } # new for 1.3
		command = { type = belligerence which = GER value = 2 }	# increased for 1.3
		command = { type = belligerence which = HUN value = 2 }	# increased for 1.3
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 470 } # The rest of the Czech Republic
		command = { type = addcore which = 468 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 469 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 475 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 474 }  # BHT1.5
		command = { type = addcore which = 3164 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = addcore which = 3166 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = addcore which = 3168 } # BHT1.5
    command = { type = addcore which = 3167 } # 伊钦		
		command = { type = alliance which = HUN }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2202 } # CZE
		command = { type = trigger which = 51 } # UK Gears up for war
		command = { type = trigger which = 52 } # France Gears up for war
	}
	action_c = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2040C" # Honor the Munich Agreement
		ai_chance = 1
		command = { type = dissent value = 4 } # new for 1.3
		command = { type = relation which = CZE value = 30 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = 20 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 20 }
		command = { type = relation which = POL value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = HUN value = -10 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  The End of Czechoslovakia - Slovakia Independent (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2201
	random = no
	country = CZE
	name = "EVT_2201_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2201_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "End_Czech"

	# Triggered by GER 2040

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2201A" # Accept the inevitable (Game Over)
		ai_chance = 99

		# Seventy two units are deleted:
		command = { type = leave_alliance }
		###Slovakia Independent###
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = HUN value = 499 } #Presov (BHT1.5撤销)
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = HUN value = 3174 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = HUN value = 3175 } # BHT1.5		
		command = { type = independence which = SLO value = 1 }

#########################################################################
#  The End of Czechoslovakia--ahistorical case that HUN does not exist (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2041
	random = no
	country = GER

	trigger = {
		event = 2003 # German event signalling annexation of Sudetenland
		exists = CZE
		or = {
			NOT = { exists = HUN }
			NOT = { event = 2511 } # The First Vienna Diktat - Czechoslovakia folds under German duress (BHT1.5)
		}
		NOT = {
			exists = SLO
			ispuppet = CZE
			alliance = { country = CZE country = GER }
#			alliance = { country = CZE country = ENG }
			alliance = { country = CZE country = SOV }
			war = { country = CZE country = GER }
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_2040_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2040_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "czechs_annexed"

	date = { day = 13 month = march year = 1939 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2040A" # Install Tiso in Slovakia
		ai_chance = 99
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -80 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -80 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = POL value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -3 } # new for 1.3
		command = { type = belligerence which = GER value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 470 } # The rest of the Czech Republic
		command = { type = addcore which = 468 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 469 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 475 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 474 }  # BHT1.5
		command = { type = addcore which = 3164 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = addcore which = 3166 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = addcore which = 3168 } # BHT1.5
    command = { type = addcore which = 3167 } # 伊钦			
		command = { type = trigger which = 2201 } # CZE
		command = { type = trigger which = 51 } # UK Gears up for war
		command = { type = trigger which = 52 } # France Gears up for war
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2040 }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2040C" # Honor the Munich Agreement
		ai_chance = 1
		command = { type = dissent value = 4 } # new for 1.3
		command = { type = relation which = CZE value = 30 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = 20 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 20 }
		command = { type = relation which = POL value = 10 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2040 }
	}
}

		}

#  The Molotov-Ribbentrop Pact
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2050
	random = no
	country = GER
	trigger = {
		exists = SOV
		exists = POL
		NOT = {
			war = { country = SOV country = GER  }
			alliance = { country = GER country = POL }
			alliance = { country = GER country = SOV }
			ispuppet = GER
			ispuppet = SOV
			ispuppet = POL
		}
	}
	name = "EVT_2050_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2050_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "Mol_Rib"

	date = { day = 23 month = august year = 1939 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2050A" # Historical Agreement
		ai_chance = 95
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = 15 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = EST value = -75 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = LAT value = -75 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = LIT value = -75 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2600 } # SOV
		command = { type = trigger which = 51 } # UK Gears up for war
		command = { type = trigger which = 52 } # France Gears up for war
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2050B" # Only agree to partition Poland
		ai_chance = 4
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = 10 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 51 } # UK Gears up for war
		command = { type = trigger which = 52 } # France Gears up for war
		command = { type = trigger which = 2601 } # SOV
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2620 }
	}
	action_c = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2050C" # No deals with the Bolsheviks!
		ai_chance = 1
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -20 }
		command = { type = relation which = FIN value = 75 }
		command = { type = relation which = HUN value = 75 }
		command = { type = relation which = ROM value = 50 }
		command = { type = end_non_aggression which = GER where = SOV }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2620 }
	}
}

		name = "ACTIONNAME2600B" # No deals with the enemies of the Workers!
		ai_chance = 2
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -15 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2014 } # GER
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2018 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2605 } #Germany dishonors Pact
	}
	action_c = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2600C" # Propose an unholy alliance
		ai_chance = 1
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = 25 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2015 } # GER

		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2650 } #Germany attacks w/o pact
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Danzig or War (Last chance for peace) - UK stands with Poland
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2027
	random = no
	country = GER

	trigger = {
		alliance = { country = ENG country = POL }
		exists = POL
		government = fascist
		NOT = {
			owned = { province = 303 data = GER } # Danzig
			alliance = { country = GER country = POL }
			war = { country = GER country = POL }
			puppet = { country = POL country = GER }
			ispuppet = GER
			atwar = GER
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_2027_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2027_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "Danzig"

	date = { day = 29 month = august year = 1939 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2027A" # Final Ultimatum - Danzig or War
		ai_chance = 99
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -10 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 303 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3601 } # POL
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2027B" # Time to back down
		ai_chance = 1
		command = { type = relation which = POL value = 15 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = 5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -1 }
	}
}

	country = GER

	trigger = {
		event = 2100 # Germany presses for Anschluss new for Armageddon
		event = 2200 # Germany demands Sudetenland new for Armageddon

			event = 2000 # Germany re-occupies Rhineland (Human)  new for Armageddon
			event = 2060 # Germany re-occupies Rhineland (AI)  new for Armageddon
		}
		exists = POL
		government = fascist
		NOT = {
			owned = { province = 303 data = GER } # Danzig
			alliance = { country = GER country = POL }
			war = { country = GER country = POL }
			puppet = { country = POL country = GER }
			ispuppet = GER
			atwar = GER
			alliance = { country = ENG country = POL } # new for Armageddon
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_2027_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2027_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "Danzig"

	date = { day = 29 month = august year = 1939 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2027A" # Final Ultimatum - Danzig or War
		ai_chance = 99
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -10 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 303 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3602 } # POL
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2027B" # Time to back down
		ai_chance = 1
		command = { type = relation which = POL value = 15 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = 5 }

	id = 2018
	random = no
	country = GER

	trigger = {
#		control = { province = 485 data = GER } # Warzaw (BHT1.5 撤销)
		control = { province = 485 data = -3 } # BHT1.5
		OR = {
			NOT = { exists = POL }
			AND = {
				exists = POL
				OR = {
					alliance = { country = POL country = GER }
					puppet = { country = POL country = GER }   # BHT1.5
				}
			}
		}
		OR = {
			NOT = { exists = U00 }
			AND = {
				exists = U00
				OR = {
					alliance = { country = U00 country = GER }
					puppet = { country = U00 country = GER }   # BHT1.5
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			war = { country = GER country = SOV }
			event = 2624
		}
		OR = {
			event = 2013
			event = 2015
			event = 2016
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_2018_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2018_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "E_Poland_Sov"

#	date = { day = 2 month = january year = 1936 }
	date = { day = 23 month = august year = 1939 } # 优化检测时间 (BHT1.5)
	offset = 3 # Check for trigger conditions every three days
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2018A" # Honor the Pact
		ai_chance = 100
#		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = 10 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 500 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 501 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 502 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 503 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 504 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 505 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 506 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 507 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 508 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 562 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 229 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 222 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 210 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 209 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 211 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 213 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 214 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 208 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 3130 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 3135 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 3136 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 3137 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 3138 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 3140 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 3141 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 3142 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 486 }  # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SOV value = 3131 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = oilpool value = 2000 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2604 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2301 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2507 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2704 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3604 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = trigger which = 3605 } # BHT1.5
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "EVT_2018_ACTB" # Honor the Pact
		ai_chance = 0
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -30 }
		command = { type = belligerence value = 5 }
		command = { type = setflag which = Pact_Broken }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 2604
	random = no
	country = SOV

	# Triggered by GER 2018

	name = "EVT_2604_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2604_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "E_Poland_Sov"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK" # Great!
		command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = SOV value = 5 }
		command = { type = oilpool value = -2000 }
		command = { type = supplies value = 1000 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  The Molotov-Ribbentrop Pact - Germany dishonors the pact (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2605
	random = no
	country = SOV
	persistent = yes		# BHT1.5

	name = "EVT_2605_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2605_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "Mol_Rib"

	date = { day = 24 month = august year = 1939 }
	offset = 25
	deathdate = { day = 28 month = december year = 1941 }
#	deathdate = { day = 28 month = january year = 1940 }

	trigger = {
		flag = Pact_Broken
		NOT = {											# BHT1.5
			war = { country = GER country = SOV }		# BHT1.5
			alliance = { country = GER country = SOV }	# BHT1.5
		}												# BHT1.5
		OR = {											# BHT1.5
			ai = GER									# BHT1.5
			NOT = { flag = normal	}						# BHT1.5
		}												# BHT1.5
	}

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2605A" # We shall never forget this!
		ai_chance = 70
		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -30 }
		command = { type = clrflag which = Pact_Broken }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2605B" # This means war!
		ai_chance = 30
		command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
		command = { type = war which = GER }
		command = { type = clrflag which = Pact_Broken }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  The Molotov-Ribbentrop Pact - Germany dishonors the pact Hard ver. (by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2667
	random = no
	country = SOV
	persistent = yes

	name = "EVT_2605_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2605_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "Mol_Rib"

	date = { day = 24 month = august year = 1939 }
	offset = 25
	deathdate = { day = 28 month = december year = 1941 }

	trigger = {
		flag = Pact_Broken
		NOT = {
			war = { country = GER country = SOV }
			alliance = { country = GER country = SOV }
			ai = GER
		}
		flag = normal
	}

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2605A" # We shall never forget this!
		ai_chance = 0
		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -30 }
		command = { type = clrflag which = Pact_Broken }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2605B" # This means war!
		ai_chance = 100
		command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
		command = { type = war which = GER }
		command = { type = clrflag which = Pact_Broken }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Germany Invades Poland without our Blessing! (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2650
	random = no
	country = SOV

	name = "EVT_2650_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2650_DESC"
	style = 0

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 17
	deathdate = { day = 28 month = january year = 1999 }

	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			event = 2013 # Historical Pact
			event = 2015 # Unholy Alliance, rejected or signed
			event = 2016 # Limited Pact
		}
		OR = {
			non_aggression = { country = GER country = SOV }
			guarantee = { country = SOV country = POL }
		}
		atwar = no
		OR = {
			AND = {
				under_attack = POL
				war = { country = GER country = POL }
			}
			AND = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { exists = POL }
					AND = {												# BHT1.5
						exists = POL									# BHT1.5
						OR = {											# BHT1.5
							alliance = { country = POL country = GER }	# BHT1.5
							puppet = { country = POL country = GER }	# BHT1.5
						}												# BHT1.5
					}													# BHT1.5
				}
				OR = {													# BHT1.5
					NOT = { exists = U00 }								# BHT1.5
					AND = {												# BHT1.5
						exists = U00									# BHT1.5
						OR = {											# BHT1.5
							alliance = { country = U00 country = GER }	# BHT1.5
							puppet = { country = U00 country = GER }	# BHT1.5
						}												# BHT1.5
					}													# BHT1.5
				}														# BHT1.5
				OR = {
					control = { province = 485 data = GER } # Warsaw
					control = { province = 485 data = POL }				# BHT1.5
					control = { province = 485 data = U00 }				# BHT1.5
				}
			}
		}
		OR = {
			ai = GER													# BHT1.5
			NOT = { flag = normal }										# BHT1.5
		}
	}

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_2650_ACTA"
		ai_chance = 90
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -40 }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "EVT_2650_ACTB"
		ai_chance = 10
		command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = POL value = 50 }
		command = { type = war which = GER }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Germany Invades Poland without our Blessing! Hard ver. (by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2668
	random = no
	country = SOV

	name = "EVT_2650_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2650_DESC"
	style = 0

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 17
	deathdate = { day = 28 month = january year = 1999 }

	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			event = 2013 # Historical Pact
			event = 2015 # Unholy Alliance, rejected or signed
			event = 2016 # Limited Pact
		}
		OR = {
			non_aggression = { country = GER country = SOV }
			guarantee = { country = SOV country = POL }
		}
		atwar = no
		OR = {
			AND = {
				under_attack = POL
				war = { country = GER country = POL }
			}
			AND = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { exists = POL }
					AND = {
						exists = POL
						OR = {
							alliance = { country = POL country = GER }
							puppet = { country = POL country = GER }
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					NOT = { exists = U00 }
					AND = {
						exists = U00
						OR = {
							alliance = { country = U00 country = GER }
							puppet = { country = U00 country = GER }
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					control = { province = 485 data = GER } # Warsaw
					control = { province = 485 data = POL }
					control = { province = 485 data = U00 }
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { ai = GER }
		flag = normal
	}

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_2650_ACTA"
		ai_chance = 0
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -40 }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "EVT_2650_ACTB"
		ai_chance = 100
		command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = POL value = 50 }
		command = { type = war which = GER }
	}
}

#########################################################################

	country = POL

		ai = yes

		OR = {
			event = 2013
			event = 2015
			event = 2016
		}
	}

	desc = "EVT_2018_DESC"
	style = 0

#########################################################################
#  The Molotov-Ribbentrop Pact - Germany dishonors the pact (Added by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2042
	random = no
	country = GER

	trigger = {
		not = {
			ai = ger
			war = { country = sov country = ger }
		}
		war = { country = fin country = ger }
	}

	name = "EVT_2605_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2605_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "Mol_Rib"

	date = { day = 24 month = august year = 1939 }
	offset = 7
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1941 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2018A" # Honor the Pact
		ai_chance = 100
		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
		command = { type = peace which = FIN value = 1 }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "EVT_2018_ACTB" # Honor the Pact
		ai_chance = 0
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -30 }
		command = { type = belligerence value = 5 }
		command = { type = setflag which = Pact_Broken }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Altmark Incident
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 26
	random = no
	country = GER

	name = EVT_26_NAME
	desc = EVT_26_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "Altmark"

	trigger = {
		war = { country = ENG country = GER }
		exists = NOR
		NOT = {
			alliance = { country = NOR country = GER }
			alliance = { country = NOR country = ENG }
			alliance = { country = NOR country = SOV }
		}
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = march year = 1940 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = april year = 1942 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 100
		name = EVT_26_ACTA
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = relation which = NOR value = -10 }
		command = { type = setflag which = WeserubungFall }
		command = { type = trigger which = 27 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 28 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 0
		name = EVT_26_ACTB
#		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = -1 }
		command = { type = relation which = NOR value = -10 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 27 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 28 }
	}
}

	id = 27
	random = no
	country = ENG

	name = EVT_27_NAME
	desc = EVT_27_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "Altmark"

	# Triggered by German event 26

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 97
		name = EVT_27_ACTA
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
#		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 3
		name = EVT_27_ACTB
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
#		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = -1 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Fall Weserubung (Edited by HSR&MIH)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 29
	random = no
	country = GER

	name = EVT_29_NAME
	desc = EVT_29_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "weserubung"

	trigger = {
		ai = yes	#AI事件 人类玩家事件45034
		OR = {
			exists = NOR
			exists = DEN
		}
		war = { country = ENG country = GER }
		OR = {
			flag = oreroute
			and = {	flag = WeserubungFall month = 3 }	
		}
		NOT = {
			atwar = NOR
			atwar = DEN
			war = { country = ger country = pol }
			alliance = { country = SOV country = DEN }
			alliance = { country = SOV country = NOR }
			alliance = { country = GER country = DEN }
			alliance = { country = GER country = NOR }
			war = { country = GER country = SOV }
		}
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = march year = 1940 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = may year = 1940 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 100
		name = EVT_29_ACTA
		command = { type = war which = NOR }
		command = { type = war which = DEN }
		command = { type = add_corps which = "威悉河运输队 " value = naval when = 384 where = 296 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "第1特种行动舰队 " value = transport when = 0 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "第2特种行动舰队 " value = transport when = 0 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "第3特种行动舰队 " value = transport when = 0 }
		command = { type = relation which = DEN value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = NOR value = -10 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 0
		name = EVT_29_ACTB
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = -1 }
	}
}

	id = 93
	random = no
	country = DEN

	name = EVT_93_NAME
	desc = EVT_93_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "denmark"

	trigger = {
		war = { country = GER country = DEN }
		NOT = { exists = POL }
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 99
		name = EVT_93_ACTA
		command = { type = leave_alliance }
		command = { type = peace which = GER value = 1 }
		command = { type = access which = GER }
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = -2 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -2 }
		command = { type = domestic which = democratic value = -2 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = 10 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ENG value = 800 } # Gothab
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ENG value = 1 } # Reykjavik
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ENG value = 2 } # Akureyri
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 91 } # Kolding
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 92 } #
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 292 } #
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 293 } #
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 294 } #
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 295 } #
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ENG value = 3001 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 3113 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 3114 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 3115 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 3116 } # BHT1.5
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = EVT_93_ACTB
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 963 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Destroying the Maginot Line (Edited by Civdemof)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2792
	random = no
	country = GER

	name = "EVT_2792_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2792_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "fort_sabotaged"

	trigger = {
		control = { province = 72 data = GER } # Maginot Line
		control = { province = 73 data = GER } #
		control = { province = 316 data = GER } #
		OR = {
			AND = {
				control = { province = 364 data = GER } #Marseille
				control = { province = 325 data = GER } #Bordeaux
				control = { province = 56 data = GER } #Paris
			}
			event = 4003
		}
	}

	date = { day = 2 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 3 # Check for trigger conditions day
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1940 }

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"  #
		command = { type = construct which = land_fort where = 72 value = -10 }
		command = { type = construct which = land_fort where = 73 value = -10 }
		command = { type = construct which = land_fort where = 316 value = -10 }

		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2789 } # 马奇诺防线事件组(Civdemof)
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2790 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 40611 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 40612 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  The Yugoslavian coup d'etat (Germany, Yugoslavia) (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 5
	random = no
	country = YUG

	trigger = {
		war = { country = GER country = ENG }
		alliance = { country = YUG country = GER }
		random = 50
	}

	name = EVT_5_NAME
	desc = EVT_5_DESC
	picture = "yougoslavian"
	style = 0

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 3
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = EVT_5_ACTA
		ai_chance = 99
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
		command = { type = domestic which = democratic value = -2 }
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = -2 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -2 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = EVT_5_ACTB
		ai_chance = 1
		command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
		command = { type = peace_with_all which = YUG }	 # BHT1.5
#		command = { type = peace which = ENG value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = SOV value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = USA value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = leave_alliance }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 6 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 3 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = 1 }
		command = { type = headofstate which = 20094 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 20033 }
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 20040 }
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 20050 }
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 20057 }
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 20064 }
		command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 20071 }
		command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 20078 }
		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 20084 }
		command = { type = chiefofair which = 20010 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = ITA value = -100 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = HUN value = -100 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = ROM value = -100 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = BUL value = -100 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 6 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 6
	random = no
	country = YUG

	trigger = {
		war = { country = GER country = ENG }
		alliance = { country = YUG country = GER }
		event = 5
		random = 50
	}

	name = EVT_6_NAME
	desc = EVT_6_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "Yugoslav coup"

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 3
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = EVT_6_ACTA
		ai_chance = 99
		command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
		command = { type = leave_alliance }
		command = { type = peace_with_all which = YUG }	 # BHT1.5
#		command = { type = peace which = ENG value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = SOV value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = USA value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 6 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 3 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = headofstate which = 20094 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 20033 }
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 20040 }
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 20050 }
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 20057 }
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 20064 }
		command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 20071 }
		command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 20078 }
		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 20084 }
		command = { type = chiefofair which = 20010 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = ITA value = -100 }

			exists = YUG

		}
	}

	picture = "Croatia"

		name = "ACTIONNAME2031A" # Create Croatia
		command = { type = independence which = CRO value = 1 }
		command = { type = alliance which = CRO }

	}

	}
}

event = {
	id = 2025
	random = no
	country = GER

	trigger = {
		government = fascist
		headofstate = 1
		war = { country = GER country = SOV }

		control = { province = 175 data = SOV } #Moscow
		control = { province = 187 data = SOV } #Leningrad
		control = { province = 212 data = SOV } #Minsk
		control = { province = 238 data = SOV } #Kiev
		control = { province = 253 data = SOV } #Sevastopol
		control = { province = 233 data = SOV } #Odessa
		NOT = {
			event = 2625 #Bitter Peace (w/o Japan)
			event = 2646 #Bitter Peace (w/ Japan)
			event = 66   #UK surrendering
			event = 67   #US surrendering

#				control = { province = 515 data = ITA } #Rome (BHT1.5 撤销)

				control = { province = 521 data = ITA } #Naples

		name = "OK" #

#########################################################################
#  Failed Assassination of Hitler
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2026
	random = no
	country = GER

	trigger = {
		government = fascist
		headofstate = 1
		war = { country = GER country = SOV }
		war = { country = GER country = ENG } #Two front war a must
		control = { province = 175 data = SOV } #Moscow
		control = { province = 187 data = SOV } #Leningrad
		control = { province = 212 data = SOV } #Minsk
		control = { province = 238 data = SOV } #Kiev
		control = { province = 253 data = SOV } #Sevastopol
		control = { province = 233 data = SOV } #Odessa
		NOT = {
			event = 2625 #Bitter Peace (w/o Japan)
			event = 2646 #Bitter Peace (w/ Japan)
			event = 66   #UK surrendering
			event = 67   #US surrendering
			event = 2026 #Failed Hitler Assassination
			AND = {
#				control = { province = 515 data = ITA } #Rome (BHT1.5 撤销)
				control = { province = 519 data = ITA } #Rome (BHT1.5)
				control = { province = 521 data = ITA } #Naples
				control = { province = 523 data = ITA } #Taranto
				alliance = { country = GER country = ITA }
			}
			AND = {
#				control = { province = 515 data = RSI } #Rome (BHT1.5 撤销)
				control = { province = 519 data = RSI } #Rome (BHT1.5)
				control = { province = 521 data = RSI } #Naples
				control = { province = 523 data = RSI } #Taranto
				alliance = { country = GER country = RSI }
			}
			AND = {
#				control = { province = 515 data = GER } #Rome (BHT1.5 撤销)
				control = { province = 519 data = GER } #Rome (BHT1.5)
				control = { province = 521 data = GER } #Naples
				control = { province = 523 data = GER } #Taranto
			}
			AND = {
				control = { province = 56 data = VIC } #Paris
				control = { province = 38 data = VIC } #Cherbourg
				control = { province = 43 data = VIC } #Dunkerque
				alliance = { country = GER country = VIC }
			}
			AND = {
				control = { province = 56 data = GER } #Paris
				control = { province = 38 data = GER } #Cherbourg
				control = { province = 43 data = GER } #Dunkerque
			}
		}
		random = 30 # BHT1.5
	}

#	name = "EVT_2026_NAME" # BHT1.5撤销
#	desc = "EVT_2026_DESC" # BHT1.5撤销
	name = "EVT_1100044_NAME" # MIH事件描述
	desc = "EVT_1100044_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "hitler_assasination"
	style = 0
	picture = "Fail_Hitler_Assasination"

	date = { day = 0 month = june year = 1941 }
	offset = 3 # Check for trigger conditions every seven days
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "OK" #
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -2 }

		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 138 }
		command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 157 }

		command = { type = sleepminister which = 7 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 34 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 35 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 48 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 68 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 69 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 77 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 6 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 92 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 99 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 101 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 102 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 125 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 126 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 127 }

		command = { type = sleepminister which = 146 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 148 }

#########################################################################
#  Surrender events - Partition of Germany (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 38
	random = no
	country = GER

	name = EVT_38_NAME
	desc = EVT_38_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "ger_surrender"

	trigger = {
		war = { country = GER country = USA }
		war = { country = GER country = ENG }
		war = { country = GER country = SOV }
		or = { 
		  lost_national = { country = GER value = 70 }
		  lost_ic = { country = GER value = 70 } 
		  lost_VP = { country = GER value = 70 }		  
		  }
#		OR = {
#			control = { province = 56 data = USA } # BHT1.5 撤销
#			control = { province = 56 data = FRA } # BHT1.5 撤销
#			control = { province = 56 data = ENG } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		}
#		OR = {
#			NOT = { # BHT1.5 撤销
#				control = { province = 300 data = GER } # Berlin # BHT1.5 撤销
#			}
#			lost_national = { country = GER value = 90 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		}
			control = { province = 56 data = -2 } # BHT1.5
			control = { province = 75 data = -2 } # BHT1.5
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 99
		name = EVT_38_ACTA
		command = { type = trigger which = 3730 } # BHT1.5
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = EVT_38_ACTB
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = democratic value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 39 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 40 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 41 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 42 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Italy Events
#########################################################################
#  Annexation of Albania
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2902
	random = no
	country = ITA

	trigger = {
		exists = ALB
		OR = {
			event = 2006	# Germany annexes Bohemia and Moravia - Mussolini feels he must not be outdone...
			event = 2011
		}
		NOT = {
			alliance = { country = ALB country = ITA }
			war = { country = ALB country = ITA }
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_2902_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2902_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "Albania"

	date = { day = 25 month = march year = 1939 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2902A" # Send an Ultimatum to King Zog
		ai_chance = 99
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = relation which = ALB value = -20 }
		command = { type = relation which = YUG value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = GRE value = -5 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3500 } # Alb
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2902B" # We have no need of Albania
		ai_chance = 1
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -1 }
		command = { type = relation which = ALB value = 20 }
		command = { type = relation which = YUG value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = GRE value = 5 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Italian Ultimatum
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 3500
	random = no
	country = ALB

	# Triggered by ITA 2902

	name = "EVT_3500_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3500_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "Albania"

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME3500A" # Never!
		ai_chance = 98
		command = { type = trigger which = 2903 }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME3500B" # Very well. (Game Over)
		ai_chance = 2
		command = { type = trigger which = 2904 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Annexation of Albania - Zog refuses
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2903
	random = no
	country = ITA

	# Triggered by ALB 3500

	name = "EVT_2903_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2903_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "Albania"

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2903A" # Declare War
		ai_chance = 99
		command = { type = war which = ALB }
		command = { type = relation which = YUG value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = GRE value = -10 }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2903B" # We do not dare follow through
		ai_chance = 1
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ALB value = 10 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Annexation of Albania - Zog accepts
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2904
	random = no
	country = ITA

	# Triggered by ALB 3500

	name = "EVT_2904_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2904_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "Albania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK" # Great!
		command = { type = inherit which = ALB }
		command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = YUG value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = GRE value = -10 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
# Italy Surrenders (Italy, England, USA) (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 36
	random = no
	country = ITA

	name = EVT_36_NAME
	desc = EVT_36_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "Ita_Surrender"

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			alliance = { country = ITA country = GER }
			war = { country = GER country = ENG }		# BHT1.5
		}
		headofstate = 3001
		war = { country = ITA country = ENG }
		OR = {
			headofgovernment = 3002 # Mussolini (FA)
			headofgovernment = 3043 # Mussolini (NS)
			headofgovernment = 3044 # Borghese  (NS)
		}
		random = 40
		# North Italy in italian hands
#		AND = {																		# BHT1.5 撤销
#			control = { province = 531 data = ITA } #Turin controlled by Italy		# BHT1.5 撤销
#			control = { province = 368 data = ITA } #Genoa controlled by Italy		# BHT1.5 撤销
#			control = { province = 370 data = ITA } #Milan controlled by Italy		# BHT1.5 撤销
#			control = { province = 371 data = ITA } #Trento controlled by Italy		# BHT1.5 撤销
#			control = { province = 378 data = ITA } #Venice controlled by Italy		# BHT1.5 撤销
#			control = { province = 379 data = ITA } #Ferrara controlled by Italy	# BHT1.5 撤销
#			control = { province = 512 data = ITA } #Bologna controlled by Italy	# BHT1.5 撤销
#			control = { province = 369 data = ITA } #La Spezia controlled by Italy	# BHT1.5 撤销
#			control = { province = 513 data = ITA } #Florence controlled by Italy	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		}																			# BHT1.5 撤销

		OR = {
			lost_national = { country = ITA value = 70 }			# BHT1.5
			AND = {
				lost_national = { country = ITA value = 50 }		# BHT1.5
				NOT = { control = { province = 519 data = ITA } }	# BHT1.5
			}
			AND = {
				# Africa NOT in Italy hands
				NOT = {
					AND = {
						control = { province = 932 data = ITA } #Tripoli NOT controlled by Italy
						control = { province = 919 data = ITA } #Tobruk NOT controlled by Italy
						control = { province = 924 data = ITA } #Benghazi NOT controlled by Italy
						control = { province = 1046 data = ITA } #Addis Abeba NOT controlled by Italy
						control = { province = 939 data = ITA } #Tunis NOT controlled by Italy
					}
				}
				# South Italy invaded
				NOT = {
					AND = {
#						control = { province = 515 data = ITA } # Roma NOT controlled by Italy # BHT1.5 撤销
						control = { province = 519 data = ITA } # Roma NOT controlled by Italy # BHT1.5
						control = { province = 523 data = ITA } # Taranto NOT controlled by Italy
						control = { province = 522 data = ITA } # Cosenza NOT controlled by Italy
						control = { province = 521 data = ITA } # Napoli NOT controlled by Italy
					}
				}
				#Sicily or Sardinia captured
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						control = { province = 525 data = ITA }
						control = { province = 526 data = ITA }
					}
					NOT = { control = { province = 534 data = ITA } }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 10
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 99
		name = EVT_36_ACTA
		command = { type = dissent value = -10 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3408 } # BHT1.5
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = EVT_36_ACTB
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = democratic value = -1 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = -200 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 956 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 37 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 37
	random = no
	country = ENG

	name = EVT_37_NAME
	desc = EVT_37_DESC
	picture = "war"
	style = 0

	# triggered by 36

	action_a = {
		name = EVT_37_ACTA
		command = { type = money value = 10 }
		command = { type = make_puppet which = ITA } # ITA joins allies
		command = { type = independence which = ETH value = 1 }
#		command = { type = war which = RSI } # BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = alliance which = ETH }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 956
	random = no
	country = GER

	name = "EVT_956_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_956_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "Ita_surrender"

	trigger = {
		event = 37
		headofstate = 1
		war = { country = GER country = ENG }
		random = 40
		control = { province = 3197 data = GER }
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 10
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "建立 "
		command = { type = independence which = RSI value = 1 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
		command = { type = supplies value = 1000 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2908 }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "不需要 "
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 2908
	random = no
	country = RSI

	name = "意大利社会共和国割让 南提罗尔和的里雅斯特给德国 "
	desc = "意大利社会共和国成立后不久，就被迫同德国签订协议，割让南 提罗尔和的里雅斯特给德国，并同意德国可以在适当的时候占领 威尼斯。 "
	style = 0
	picture = "Ita_surrender"

	action_a = {
		name = "ok"
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 371 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 3198 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 3200 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 3201 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 3202 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 4081 }  # 天问修改		
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Other Europe Axis Country Events
#########################################################################
#  The First Vienna Diktat (Added by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2510
	random = no
	country = HUN

	trigger = {
		exists = GER
		exists = CZE
		event = 2003 # The Treaty of Munich - Sudetenland to Germany
		OR = {
			control = { province = 490 data = CZE }
			control = { province = 3171 data = CZE }
			control = { province = 3175 data = CZE }
		}
		NOT = {
			war = { country = HUN country = CZE }
			war = { country = HUN country = GER }
			war = { country = HUN country = ITA }
		}
	}

	name = "第一次维也纳勒令 "
	desc = "斯洛伐克在第一次世界大战前一直是奥匈帝国的一部分，特里亚 农条约的签署使匈牙利的领土减少为原来的三分之一，人口也减 少了五分之三。斯洛伐克成为新成立的捷克斯洛伐克的一部分。 匈牙利海军上将霍尔蒂要求重新划分边界，１９３８年他在第一 次维也纳勒令中得偿所愿，德国和意大利迫使捷克斯洛伐克将斯 洛伐克及喀尔巴阡山脉罗塞尼亚（今乌克兰西部）南部割让给匈 牙利。 "
	style = 0

	offset = 3

#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2710
	random = no
	country = BUL

	trigger = {
		control = { province = 423 data = ROM } # Constanta
	}

	name = "EVT_2710_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2710_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "romania"

	date = { day = 7 month = september year = 1940 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 8 month = september year = 1940 }

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_2710_ACTA" # Bulgaria demands Constanta from Romania
		ai_chance = 95
		command = { type = relation which = ROM value = -50 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2711 } #Romania's response
#		command = { type = sleepevent which = 3424 }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "EVT_2710_ACTB" # Bulgaria does not demand Constanta from Romania
		ai_chance = 5
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -1 }
		command = { type = relation which = ROM value = 25 }
#		command = { type = sleepevent which = 3424 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Bulgaria demands Constanta (ROM)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2711
	random = no
	country = ROM

	# Triggered by BUL 2710A

	name = "EVT_2710_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2710_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "romania"

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_2711_ACTA" # Romania cedes Constanta to Bulgaria
		ai_chance = 95
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = BUL value = 423 } #Constanta
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = BUL value = 436 } #Constanta		
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = BUL value = 3241 } #BHT 1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = BUL value = 3242 } #BHT 1.5			
#		command = { type = construct which = naval_base where = 436 value = 1 }		# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = construct which = naval_base where = 423 value = -2 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2713 } # BHT 1.5 优化检测
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2714 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2715 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2716 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2717 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2718 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2719 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2720 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2721 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2722 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2723 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2724 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2725 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2726 } # BHT 1.5
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "EVT_2711_ACTB" # Romania stands up to Bulgaria
		ai_chance = 5
		command = { type = leave_alliance }
		command = { type = peace_with_all which = ROM }  # BHT1.5

#		command = { type = peace which = ENG value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = USA value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = CAN value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = MEX value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = VEN value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = PAN value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = LIB value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = PHI value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = JAP value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = SOV value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销

#		command = { type = peace which = CHI value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = CHC value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = CSX value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = CGX value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = CXB value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = SIK value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = CYN value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销

		command = { type = end_guarantee which = SOV where = ROM }
		command = { type = end_guarantee which = GER where = ROM }
		command = { type = set_relation which = BUL value = -150 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -10 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2712 } #Bulgaria's Response
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Romania defies Bulgaria
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2712
	random = no
	country = BUL

	# Triggered by ROM 2711B

	name = "EVT_2712_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2712_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "romania_tank"

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_2712_ACTA" # Bulgaria takes Constanta by force
		ai_chance = 75
		command = { type = leave_alliance }
		command = { type = peace which = ENG value = 1 }
		command = { type = end_guarantee which = SOV where = BUL }
		command = { type = end_guarantee which = GER where = BUL }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = war which = ROM }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "EVT_2712_ACTB" # Bulgaria stands down
		ai_chance = 25
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = -1 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2713 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2714 } # BHT 1.5 优化检测
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2715 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2716 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2717 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2718 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2719 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2720 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2721 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2722 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2723 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2724 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2725 } # BHT 1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2726 } # BHT 1.5
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Hungary exploits the situation
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2713
	random = no
	country = HUN

	# Triggered by BUL 2712

	name = "EVT_2713_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2713_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "hungarian_tank"

	trigger = {
		event = 2712
		war = { country = BUL country = ROM }
		random = 40
	}

	date = { day = 2 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 7 # Check for trigger conditions day
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_2713_ACTA" # Hungary gang-bangs Romania
		ai_chance = 75
		command = { type = leave_alliance }
		command = { type = peace_with_all which = HUN }  # BHT1.5

#		command = { type = peace which = ENG value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = USA value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = CAN value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = MEX value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = VEN value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = PAN value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = LIB value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = PHI value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = JAP value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = SOV value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销

#		command = { type = peace which = CHI value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = CHC value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = CSX value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = CGX value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = CXB value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = SIK value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = CYN value = 1 } # BHT1.5 撤销

		command = { type = end_guarantee which = SOV where = HUN }
		command = { type = end_guarantee which = GER where = HUN }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = war which = ROM }
		command = { type = dissent value = -10 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2714 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2716 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2717 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2721 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2722 }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "EVT_2713_ACTB" # Hungary doesn't get involved
		ai_chance = 25
		command = { type = non_aggression which = HUN where = ROM }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2714 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2715 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2718 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2719 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2720 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2723 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2724 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2725 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2726 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Bulgaria and Hungary Join Forces
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2714
	random = no
	country = BUL

	trigger = {
		event = 2713
		war = { country = HUN country = ROM }
		war = { country = BUL country = ROM }
	}

	date = { day = 2 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 1 # Check for trigger conditions day
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	name = "EVT_2714_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2714_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "hungarian_tank"

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_2714_ACTA" # Hungary joins Bulgaria
		command = { type = alliance which = HUN }
		command = { type = relation which = HUN value = 50 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2715 } #An Utter Betrayal
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  An Utter Betrayal
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2715
	random = no
	country = ROM

	# Triggered by BUL 2714A

	name = "EVT_2715_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2715_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "romanian_soldier"

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_2715_ACTA" # Hungary joins Bulgaria
		command = { type = dissent value = -10 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Romania defeated - Hungary neutral
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2716
	random = no
	country = ROM

	name = "EVT_2716_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2716_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "surrender"

	trigger = {
		event = 2713
		control = { province = 424 data = BUL } # Bucharest
		war = { country = BUL country = ROM }
		NOT = {
			alliance = { country = BUL country = HUN }
			alliance = { country = BUL country = GER }
			alliance = { country = ROM country = GER }
		}
	}

	date = { day = 2 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 1 # Check for trigger conditions day
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "OK" # Romania surrenders
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
		command = { type = peace which = BUL }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = BUL value = 423 } #Constanta
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = 3 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -2 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2717 } #Bulgaria Victorious
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Bulgaria Victorious - Hungary neutral
#########################################################################

	country = BUL

	# Triggered by ROM 2716A

	desc = "EVT_2717_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "defence"

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_2717_ACTA" # Bulgaria has won
		command = { type = dissent value = -20 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Romania defeated - Hungary involved (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2718
	random = no
	country = ROM

	name = "EVT_2716_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2716_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "surrender"

	trigger = {
		event = 2713
		OR = {
			control = { province = 424 data = BUL } # Bucharest
			control = { province = 424 data = HUN } # Bucharest
		}
		war = { country = BUL country = ROM }
		war = { country = HUN country = ROM }
		alliance = { country = BUL country = HUN }
		NOT = {
			alliance = { country = BUL country = GER }
			alliance = { country = ROM country = GER }
			alliance = { country = HUN country = GER }
		}
	}

	date = { day = 2 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 1 # Check for trigger conditions day
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "OK" # Romania surrenders
		command = { type = dissent value = 20 }
		command = { type = peace which = BUL }
		command = { type = peace which = HUN }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = BUL value = 423 } #Constanta
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = BUL value = 426 } #Cr
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = HUN value = 498 } #Transylvania
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = HUN value = 427 } #Transylvania
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = HUN value = 428 } #Transylvania
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = HUN value = 429 } #Transylvania BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = HUN value = 430 } #Transylvania
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = HUN value = 495 } #Transylvania
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = HUN value = 496 } #Transylvania
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = HUN value = 3249 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = HUN value = 3250 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = HUN value = 3251 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = HUN value = 3252 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = HUN value = 3253 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = HUN value = 3254 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = HUN value = 3255 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = 3 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -2 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2719 } #Bulgaria Victorious
		command = { type = trigger which = 2720 } #Hungary Victorious
	}
}
