#########################################################################
#  Bulgaria Defeated - Hungary neutral
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2721
	random = no
	country = BUL

	name = "EVT_2721_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2721_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "surrender"

	trigger = {
		event = 2713
		control = { province = 417 data = ROM } # Sophia
		war = { country = BUL country = ROM }
		NOT = {
			war = { country = HUN country = ROM }
			alliance = { country = BUL country = GER }
			alliance = { country = ROM country = GER }
		}
	}

	date = { day = 2 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 1 # Check for trigger conditions day
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "OK" # Bulgaria has lost
		command = { type = dissent value = 20 }
		command = { type = peace which = ROM }
		command = { type = removecore which = 423 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2722 } #Romania victorious - Hungary Neutral
	}
}

		NOT = {
			alliance = { country = BUL country = GER }

		}

#  Hungary Defeated - Hungary involved (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2725
	random = no
	country = HUN

	name = "EVT_2725_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2725_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "surrender"

	trigger = {
		event = 2713
		control = { province = 457 data = ROM } # Budapest
		war = { country = HUN country = ROM }
		NOT = {
			alliance = { country = BUL country = GER }
			alliance = { country = ROM country = GER }
			alliance = { country = HUN country = GER }
		}
	}

	date = { day = 2 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 1 # Check for trigger conditions day
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_2725_ACTA" # Magyars are unlucky
		command = { type = dissent value = 20 }
		command = { type = leave_alliance }
		command = { type = peace which = ROM value = 1 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ROM value = 428 } #Transylvania
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ROM value = 496 } #Transylvania BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ROM value = 498 } #Transylvania
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ROM value = 3252 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ROM value = 3253 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ROM value = 3254 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ROM value = 3255 } # BHT1.5
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ROM value = 497 } #Debrecen
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ROM value = 499 } #Ruthenia
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ROM value = 497 }  # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ROM value = 3176 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ROM value = 3177 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = removecore which = 428 }
		command = { type = removecore which = 496 }
		command = { type = removecore which = 498 }
		command = { type = removecore which = 427 }  # BHT1.5
		command = { type = removecore which = 430 }  # BHT1.5
		command = { type = removecore which = 495 }  # BHT1.5
		command = { type = removecore which = 3249 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = removecore which = 3250 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = removecore which = 3251 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = removecore which = 3252 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = removecore which = 3253 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = removecore which = 3254 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = removecore which = 3255 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = trigger which = 2726 } #Romania victorious over Hungary
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Romania Victorious over Hungary - Hungary involved
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2726
	random = no
	country = ROM

	# Triggered by HUN 2725A

	name = "EVT_2725_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2726_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "romania_tank"

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_2717_ACTA" # Romania has won
		command = { type = dissent value = -10 }
	}
}

#  Axis minor states switch sides (HUN) (Edited by 兰々)

event = {
	id = 59
	random = no
	country = HUN

	name = EVT_59_NAME
	desc = EVT_59_DESC
	picture = "minor"
	style = 0

	trigger = {
		war = { country = GER country = SOV }
		war = { country = HUN country = SOV }
		control = { province = 457 data = SOV } #Budapest
#		control = { province = 491 data = SOV } #Miskloc	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		control = { province = 492 data = SOV } #Szeged		# BHT1.5 撤销
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 99
		name = EVT_59_ACTA
		command = { type = end_puppet }
#		command = { type = set_relation which = SOV value = 50 } # BHT1.5撤销
		command = { type = set_relation which = GER value = -50 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 62 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = EVT_59_ACTB
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Axis minor states switch sides (ROM) (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 60
	random = no
	country = ROM

	name = EVT_60_NAME
	desc = EVT_60_DESC
	picture = "minor"
	style = 0

	trigger = {
		war = { country = GER country = SOV }
		war = { country = ROM country = SOV }
		control = { province = 431 data = SOV }			# BHT1.5
		OR = {											# BHT1.5
			control = { province = 424 data = SOV }		# BHT1.5
			AND = {										# BHT1.5
				control = { province = 430 data = SOV }
				control = { province = 432 data = SOV }
#				control = { province = 431 data = SOV } # Ploesti BHT1.5 撤销
				control = { province = 436 data = SOV }
			}											# BHT1.5
		}												# BHT1.5
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 2
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 99
		name = EVT_60_ACTA
		command = { type = end_puppet }
#		command = { type = set_relation which = SOV value = 50 } # BHT1.5撤销
		command = { type = set_relation which = GER value = -50 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 63 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = EVT_60_ACTB
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 61
	random = no
	country = FIN

	name = EVT_61_NAME
	desc = EVT_61_DESC
	picture = "minor"
	style = 0

	trigger = {
		war = { country = GER country = SOV }
		war = { country = FIN country = SOV }
#		control = { province = 142 data = SOV } #Helsinki		# BHT1.5 撤销
		control = { province = 145 data = SOV } #Vip
		OR = {
			control = { province = 142 data = SOV } #Helsinki	# BHT1.5
			control = { province = 138 data = SOV } #Vaasa
			control = { province = 141 data = SOV } #Turku
		}
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 7
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 99
		name = EVT_61_ACTA
		command = { type = end_puppet }
#		command = { type = set_relation which = SOV value = 0 } # BHT1.5撤销
		command = { type = set_relation which = GER value = -50 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 64 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = EVT_61_ACTB
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
	}
}

########################################################################
#  Bulgaria switches sides (Edited by 兰々)
########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2750
	random = no
	country = BUL

	name = "EVT_2750_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2750_DESC" #Or find something sexier
	style = 0
	picture = "surrender"

	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			alliance = { country = ENG country = BUL }
			alliance = { country = USA country = BUL }
			alliance = { country = SOV country = BUL }
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				event = 63
				control = { province = 424 data = SOV }
			}
			OR = {
				war = { country = BUL country = SOV }
				alliance = { country = GER country = BUL }
			}
		}
		random = 20
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 3
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		ai_chance = 98
#		command = { type = leave_alliance }					# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = SOV value = 1 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = ENG value = 1 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = USA value = 1 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = FRA value = 1 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = end_puppet } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = set_relation which = SOV value = 50 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = GER value = -50 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2751 } #SOV event below
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "EVT_2750_ACTB"
		ai_chance = 2
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
#		command = { type = domestic which = professional_army value = -2 } # BHT1.5 撤销
	}
}

event = {
	id = 2751
	random = no
	persistent = no
	country = SOV

	#triggered by BUL event A choice

	name = "EVT_2750_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2751_DESC"  #Or something to that effect
	style = 0

	action_a = {
#		name = "OK"			# BHT1.5 撤销
		ai_chance = 99		# BHT1.5
		name = EVT_64_ACTA	# BHT1.5
		command = { type = make_puppet which = BUL }
		command = { type = alliance which = BUL }
		command = { type = money value = 250 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2752 } # BHT1.5
	}
	action_b = {								# BHT1.5
		ai_chance = 1							# BHT1.5
		name = EVT_64_ACTB						# BHT1.5
		command = { type = dissent value = 1 }	# BHT1.5
	}											# BHT1.5
}

#  1936 General Elections
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2
	random = no
	country = SPR

	name = EVT_2_NAME
	desc = EVT_2_DESC
	picture = "election"
	style = 0

	trigger = {
		government = democratic
		atwar = no
		NOT = {
			exists = SPA
		}
	}

	date = { day = 16 month = february year = 1936 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 100
		name = EVT_2_ACTA
		command = { type = dissent value = 4 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 7 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 6 }
		command = { type = headofstate which = 11033 }###
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 11068 }
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 11099 }
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 11143 }
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 11191 }
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 11221 }
		command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 11256 }
		command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 11290 }
		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 11316 }
		command = { type = chiefofair which = 11340 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 0
		name = EVT_2_ACTB
		command = { type = dissent value = 4 }
#		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 11122 } # Gil-Robles
#		command = { type = foreignminister which = 11103 } # Jmenez Fernndez
#		command = { type = armamentminister which = 11144 } # Calvo-Sotelo
#		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 11105 } # Portela Valladares
#		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 11146 } # Orgaz Yoldi
		command = { type = domestic which = democratic value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = -1 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Communist Coup - Anarchist movement crushed
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 3101
	random = no
	country = SPR

	name = "EVT_3101_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3101_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "SPR_Communist_Coup"

	trigger = {
		random = 7
		NOT = {
			government = communist
			exists = SPA
			war = { country = SPA country = SPR }
		}

	}

	# Note: historical date: May 3, 1937
	date = { day = 3 month = april year = 1937 }
	offset = 7
	deathdate = { day = 3 month = june year = 1937 }

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 5 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 9 }
		command = { type = revolt which = 357 } #Barcelona Uprising-Pending balancing
		command = { type = headofstate which = 11046 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 11060 }
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 11092 }
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 11134 }
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 11176 }
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 11217 }
		command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 11247 }
		command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 11277 }
		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 11305 }
		command = { type = chiefofair which = 11010 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -1 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = 20 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -20 }
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = -20 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = POR value = -15 }

		command = { type = sleepleader which = 3007 }
		command = { type = sleepleader which = 3050 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Spanish Civil War
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 3100
	random = no
	country = SPR

	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			exists = SPA
		}
		atwar = no
		OR = {
			government = communist
			government = democratic
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_3100_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3100_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "SCW"

	date = { day = 16 month = july year = 1936 }

	action_a = {
		name = "OK" # En la Defensa de la Democracia!
		command = { type = civil_war which = SPA }
		command = { type = dissent value = 15 }

		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 7 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 6 }
		command = { type = headofstate which = 11033 } #Azaa
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 11062 } #Largo Caballero
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 11096 } #Barcia Trelles
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 11144 } #Giner de los Rios
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 11189 } #Azcarate
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 11217 } #Balboa
		command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 11007 } #Miaja
		command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 11291 } #Miaja
		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 11309 } #Giral
		command = { type = chiefofair which = 11321 } #Hidalgo de Cisneros

		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -15 }
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = POR value = -10 }

		command = { type = add_division which = "全国工人联盟(CNT)民兵 " value = militia when = 1 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "马克思主义统一工人党(POUM)民兵 " value = militia when = 1 }

		command = { type = trigger which = 3107 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Spanish Civil War - Follow up event - Ceding oversea provinces to SPA (Edited by 兰々)

event = {
	id = 3107
	random = no
	country = SPR

	# triggered by SPR 3100

	name = "EVT_3100_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3100_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "SCW"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK" # En la Defensa de la Democracia!
    command = { type = switch_allegiance which = -1 where = SPA when = 40 }		
    command = { type = switch_allegiance which = -2 where = SPA when = 40 }	    
    command = { type = switch_allegiance which = -3 where = SPA when = 40 }	    		
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 535 } # Mallorca
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 537 } # Ibiza				# BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 954 } # Melilla
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 955 } # Villa Sanjurjo
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 957 } # Ceuta
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 961 } # Lanzarote
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 962 } # Fuerteventura
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 963 } # Gran Canaria
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 964 } # Tenerife
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 965 } # La Palma
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 967 } # Ifni
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 971 } # El Aain
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 972 } # Villa Cisneros
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 1091 } # Bata
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Spanish Civil War - Fascist Nation
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 3001
	random = no
	country = SPA

	trigger = {
		event = 3100
#		event = 3107
	}

	name = "EVT_3001_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3001_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "SPA_fascist"

	date = { day = 17 month = july year = 1936 }
#	date = { day = 11 month = january year = 1936 }
#	offset = 3
#	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "OK" # Anarchism and Communism must fall!

		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 2 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 3 }
		command = { type = change_idea which = policy_economy_Laisser-faire value = spa }
		command = { type = change_idea which = policy_social_Catholicism  value = spa }
		command = { type = change_idea which = policy_political_fascist value = spa }
						
		command = { type = headofstate which = 10001 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 10002 }
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 10003 }
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 10004 }
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 10005 }
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 10006 }
		command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 10007 }
		command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 10008 }
		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 10009 }
		command = { type = chiefofair which = 10010 }

		command = { type = sleepminister which = 10279 } #Jos Sanjurjo as HoS
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 10281 } #Jos Sanjurjo as HoG
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 10188 } #Jos Sanjurjo as CoS
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 10211 } #Jos Sanjurjo as CoA
		command = { type = sleepleader which = 3460 }	#Sanjurjo

		command = { type = supplies value = 5000 }
		command = { type = oilpool value = 25000 }
		command = { type = metalpool value = 25000 }
		command = { type = energypool value = 50000 }
		command = { type = rarematerialspool value = 25000 }

#		command = { type = trigger which = 2023 } # German intervention
#		command = { type = trigger which = 2623 } # Soviet intervention
#		command = { type = trigger which = 2801 } # French intervention
#		command = { type = trigger which = 2901 } # Italian intervention
#		command = { type = trigger which = 3400 } # UK intervention

		command = { type = add_division which = "第1长枪党民兵团 " value = militia when = 0 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "第2长枪党民兵团 " value = militia when = 0 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "纳瓦拉旅 " value = motorized when = 1 }
		command = { type = add_corps which = "非洲军团 " value = land when = 3422 where = 347 } #Seville
		command = { type = add_division which = "摩洛哥团 " value = motorized when = 1 }
		command = { type = add_division value = infantry }
		command = { type = add_division value = infantry }
		command = { type = add_division value = militia }
		command = { type = convoy which = 334 value = 347 when = 16 } #Supplies to Seville
		command = { type = add_division value = transport when = 0 }
		command = { type = add_division value = transport when = 0 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 500 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Spanish Civil War - Intervention (GER)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2023
	random = no
	country = GER

	trigger = {
		government = fascist
		war = { country = SPA country = SPR }
		event = 3100 #SPA fascist nation
		NOT = {
			war = { country = GER country = SPA }
			war = { country = GER country = SOV }
			war = { country = GER country = ENG }
			war = { country = GER country = USA }
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_2023_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2023_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "SCW_German_Intervention"

	date = { day = 19 month = july year = 1936 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2023A" # Send materiel and volunteers
		ai_chance = 99
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = -10 }
		command = { type = resource which = supplies value = -1000 } # % of max daily income
		command = { type = money value = -200 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = GER value = 1 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPA value = 20 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPR value = -20 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = 5 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3002 } #SPA
		command = { type = trigger which = 3719 } #USA
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2023B" # Franco needs no aid
		ai_chance = 1
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = GER value = -1 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPA value = -20 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPR value = 20 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = -5 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3105 } #SPR
	}
}

	id = 2901
	random = no
	country = ITA
	
	trigger = {
		government = fascist
		war = { country = SPA country = SPR }
		event = 3100 #SPA fascist nation
		NOT = {
			war = { country = ITA country = SPA }
			war = { country = ITA country = SOV }
			war = { country = ITA country = ENG }
			war = { country = ITA country = USA }
		}
	}
	
	name = "EVT_2901_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2901_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "SCW_Italian_Intervention"

	date = { day = 19 month = july year = 1936 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }
	
	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2901A" # Send materiel and volunteers
		ai_chance = 99
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = -30 }
		command = { type = resource which = supplies value = -1000 } # % of max daily income
		command = { type = money value = -200 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = ITA value = 1 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPA value = 20 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPR value = -20 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = 5 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3003 } #SPA
		command = { type = trigger which = 3720 } #USA
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2901B" # Franco needs no aid
		ai_chance = 1
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -1 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = ITA value = -1 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPA value = -20 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPR value = 20 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -5 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3106 } #SPR
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Spanish Civil War - Intervention (SOV)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2623
	random = no
	country = SOV
	
	trigger = {
		war = { country = SPA country = SPR }
		event = 3100 #SPA fascist nation
		NOT = {
			alliance = { country = SOV country = SPR }
			alliance = { country = ENG country = SPR }
			war = { country = SOV country = SPR }
			war = { country = SOV country = GER }
			war = { country = SOV country = ENG }
			war = { country = SOV country = USA }
			war = { country = SOV country = ITA }
			war = { country = SOV country = FIN }
			government = fascist
		}
	}
	
	name = "EVT_2623_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2623_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "SCW_Soviet_Intervention"
	
	date = { day = 19 month = july year = 1936 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2623A" # Send materiel and volunteers
		ai_chance = 99
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = -10 }
		command = { type = resource which = supplies value = -2000 } # % of max daily income
		command = { type = belligerence which = SOV value = 1 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPR value = 20 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPA value = -15 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = POR value = -10 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3102 } #SPR
		command = { type = trigger which = 3721 } #USA
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2623B" # Why support anarchist rabble?
		ai_chance = 1
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -1 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = SOV value = -1 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPR value = -20 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPA value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = POR value = 5 }
	}
}

	desc = "EVT_3102_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "SCW_Soviet Intervention"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK" # Great!
		command = { type = money value = -100 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 10 }
		command = { type = supplies value = 2500 }
#		command = { type = add_division which = "卡洛斯苏维埃志愿军 " value = armor when = 1 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "卡洛斯苏维埃志愿军 " value = armor when = 0 } # BHT1.5 模板
		command = { type = add_division which = "志愿军国际旅 " value = infantry when = 0 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "纳瓦拉苏维埃志愿军 " value = interceptor when = 1 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "卡提乌斯苏维埃志愿军 " value = tactical_bomber when = 1 }
		command = { type = steal_tech which = SOV }

		command = { type = wakeleader which = 3007 }
		command = { type = wakeleader which = 3050 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Spanish Civil War - Intervention (ENG)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 3400
	random = no
	country = ENG
	
	trigger = {
		war = { country = SPA country = SPR }
		event = 3100 #SPA fascist nation
		NOT = {
			government = fascist
			alliance = { country = ENG country = SPR }
			war = { country = ENG country = SPR }
			war = { country = ENG country = SOV }
			war = { country = ENG country = GER }
			war = { country = ENG country = USA }
			war = { country = ENG country = FRA }
		}
	}
	
	name = "EVT_3400_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3400_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "SCW"
	
	date = { day = 19 month = july year = 1936 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME3400A" # Why support anarchist rabble?
		ai_chance = 90
		command = { type = dissent value = 2 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -1 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPR value = -15 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPA value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = POR value = 10 }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME3400B" # Send materiel and volunteers
		ai_chance = 10
		command = { type = dissent value = 4 }
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = money value = -200 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = -10 }
		command = { type = resource which = supplies value = -1000 } # % of max daily income
		command = { type = relation which = SPR value = 15 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPA value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = POR value = -10 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3103 } #SPR
		command = { type = trigger which = 3722 } #USA
		command	= { type = setflag which = SCW_allied_intervention }
	}
}

#########################################################################
# Republican Spain wins the Civil War
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 3108
	random = no
	country = SPR

	trigger = {
		owned = { province = 341 data = SPR }
		NOT = {
			exists = SPA
			event = 3004
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_3108_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3108_DESC"

	date = { day = 18 month = july year = 1936 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = capital which = 341 }
		# In case any Italian & German units given to SPA survives the war.
		command = { type = remove_division which = "秃鹫军团战术轰炸机大队 " value = SPR }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "秃鹫军团截击机大队 " value = SPR }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "秃鹫军团坦克师 " value = SPR }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "'利托里奥'师 " value = SPR }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "'上帝的旨意'师 " value = SPR }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "'黑色火焰'师 " value = SPR }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "'黑羽'师 " value = SPR }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "空军军团海军轰炸机大队 " value = SPR }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "空军军团截击机大队 " value = SPR }

		# In case any of these four Communist, Anarchist & Fascist militia survive SCW.
		command = { type = remove_division which = "统一马克思主义工人党民兵团 " value = SPR }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "国家劳动联盟民兵团 " value = SPR }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "第1长枪党民兵团 " value = SPR }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "第2长枪党民兵团 " value = SPR }
		# Soviet units
		command = { type = remove_division which = "苏维埃坦克师 " value = SPR }	
		command = { type = remove_division which = "国际旅 " value = SPR }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "苏维埃截击机大队 " value = SPR }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "苏维埃轰炸机大队 " value = SPR }

		command = { type = sleepevent which = 3004 }	# SPA SCW win event
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Spanish Civil War ends - An important experience (USSR)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2662
	random = no
	country = SOV

	trigger = {
		# pre-requisites for event to trigger:

		government = communist
		event = 3102					# SCW soviet intervention
		NOT = {							# conditions that prevent event:
			exists = SPA
			war = { country = SOV country = SPA }
			war = { country = SOV country = SPR }
			war = { country = SOV country = FRA }
			war = { country = SOV country = GER }
			war = { country = SOV country = ENG }
			war = { country = SOV country = ITA }
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_2662_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2662_DESC"
	style = 0
	#picture = "InternationalBrigadesPoster"

	date = { day = 18 month = july year = 1936 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2662A" # Great!
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 5 }		# Soldiers return home
		command = { type = money value = 250 }			# SPR purchased weapons from USSR
		command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } 		# get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched
		command = { type = relation which = SPR value = 10 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Spanish Civil War - Victory!!!
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 3004
	random = no
	country = SPA

	trigger = {
		owned = { province = 341 data = SPA }
		NOT = {
			exists = SPR
			event = 3108
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_3004_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3004_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "SPA_Victory"

	date = { day = 18 month = july year = 1936 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }


	action_a = {
		name = "OK" # Great!
		command = { type = capital which = 341 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 3 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 4 }
		command = { type = headofstate which = 10032 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 10046 }
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 10057 }
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 10090 }
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 10129 }
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 10162 }
		command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 10183 }
		command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 10206 }
		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 10230 }

#		command = { type = sleepleader which = 3413 }
#		command = { type = sleepleader which = 3416 }
#		command = { type = sleepleader which = 3427 }
#		command = { type = sleepleader which = 3466 }
#		command = { type = sleepleader which = 3492 }
#		command = { type = sleepleader which = 3493 }
#		command = { type = sleepleader which = 3494 }

#		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2155 }
#		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2156 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = SPA value = -10 }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "秃鹫军团战术轰炸机大队 " value = SPA }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "秃鹫军团截击机大队 " value = SPA }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "秃鹫军团坦克师 " value = SPA }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "'利托里奥'师 " value = SPA }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "'上帝的旨意'师 " value = SPA }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "'黑色火焰'师 " value = SPA }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "'黑羽'师 " value = SPA }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "空军军团海军轰炸机大队 " value = SPA }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "空军军团截击机大队 " value = SPA }

		# New Commands removing any surviving "Soviet" Units SPA recive through Anneks of SPR
		command = { type = remove_division which = "苏维埃坦克师 " value = SPA }	
		command = { type = remove_division which = "国际旅 " value = SPA }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "苏维埃截击机大队 " value = SPA }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "苏维埃轰炸机大队 " value = SPA }
		# New commands removing the communist and anarchist militias if SPA gets them, when they anneks SPR.
		command = { type = remove_division which = "统一马克思主义工人党民兵团 " value = SPA }
		command = { type = remove_division which = "国家劳动联盟民兵团 " value = SPA }
		# Remove GER & ITA logistic support
		command = { type = transport_pool which = SPA value = -50 }

		command = { type = sleepleader which = 3413 }
		command = { type = sleepleader which = 3416 }
		command = { type = sleepleader which = 3427 }
		command = { type = sleepleader which = 3455 }
		command = { type = sleepleader which = 3466 }
		command = { type = sleepleader which = 3492 }
		command = { type = sleepleader which = 3493 }
		command = { type = sleepleader which = 3494 }

		Command = { type = sleepevent which = 3108 } # Repuplican SCW win event
		Command = { type = sleepevent which = 2662 } # USSR SCW Victory event
		Command = { type = sleepevent which = 2803 } # France SCW Victory event
		Command = { type = sleepevent which = 3901 } # UK SCW Victory event		
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Spanish Civil War ends - Legion Condor returns home victorious (Edited by Civdemof)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2034
	random = no
	country = GER

	trigger = {
		# pre-requisites for event to trigger:

		government = fascist
		event = 3002									# GER intervention happened
		event = 40002									# MIH 派遣秃鹰军团 (Civdemof)
		OR = {											# Also need any of the following to be true:
			event = 3004								# Spanish Civil War - Victory!!! i.e. 'Nationalists win event' has triggered
			AND = {
				flag = SCW_allied_intervention			# If allies intervene then it doesnt matter which side wins
				OR = {
					NOT = { exists = SPR }
					NOT = { exists = SPA }
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = {											# conditions that prevent event:
			war = { country = GER country = SPA }
			war = { country = GER country = SPR }
			war = { country = GER country = SOV }
			war = { country = GER country = ENG }
			war = { country = GER country = USA }
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_2034_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2034_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "SCWger" # "SCW_German_Intervention"

	date = { day = 18 month = july year = 1936 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2034A" # Great!
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 5 }				# Soldiers return home
		command = { type = gain_tech which = 9270 } 			# Combat Unit Destruction
		command = { type = gain_tech which = 9280 } 			# Hunt & Destroy
		command = { type = relation which = SPA value = 30 }	# Franco is pleased
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Spanish Civil War ends - Corpo Truppe Volontarie returns home
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2905
	random = no
	country = ITA

	trigger = {
		# pre-requisites for event to trigger:

		government = fascist
		event = 3003									# ITA intervention happened
		OR = {											# Also need any of the following to be true:
			event = 3004								# Spanish Civil War - Victory!!! i.e. 'Nationalists win event' has triggered
			AND = {
				flag = SCW_allied_intervention			# If allies intervene then it doesnt matter which side wins
				OR = {
					NOT = { exists = SPR }
					NOT = { exists = SPA }
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = {											# conditions that prevent event:
			war = { country = ITA country = SPA }
			war = { country = ITA country = SPR }
			war = { country = ITA country = SOV }
			war = { country = ITA country = ENG }
			war = { country = ITA country = USA }
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_2905_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2905_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "SCWita"

	date = { day = 18 month = july year = 1936 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2905A" # Great!
#		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 20 }			# Heroes return home - after heavy casualties
		command = { type = gain_tech which = 2310 } # Basic Field Artillery blueprints
		command = { type = gain_tech which = 4030 } 			# Basic Interceptor
		command = { type = relation which = SPA value = 20 }	# Franco is pleased
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Sweden Events
#########################################################################
#  The Summer Government (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 3303
	random = no
	country = SWE

	trigger = { }
	
	name = "EVT_3303_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3303_DESC"
	picture = "per_albin"
	style = 0

	date = { day = 19 month = june year = 1936 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = june year = 1936 } # BHT1.5

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME3303A" # Install our allies
		command = { type = set_domestic	which = political_left value = 6 }
		command = { type = set_domestic	which = free_market value = 7 }

#  Iraqi coup and intervention in Syria/Lebanon
#  by JRaup - sleep in 44

event = {
	id = 100003
	random = no
	country = IRQ

	trigger = {
		exists = SYR  #Syria must exist
		exists = GER  #Germany must exist
		NOT = {
			exists = EGY
			alliance = { country = GER country = VIC }
			alliance = { country = TUR country = ENG }
			alliance = { country = PER country = ENG }
			alliance = { country = GER country = ENG }
		}
		OR = {
			AND = {
				NOT = {
					control = { province = 911 data = ENG } #Libyan frontier to El Alamein
					control = { province = 914 data = ENG }
					control = { province = 915 data = ENG }
					control = { province = 913 data = ENG }
					control = { province = 910 data = ENG }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = {
					control = { province = 404 data = ENG } #Haifa
					control = { province = 1797 data = ENG } #Jerusalem
					control = { province = 1798 data = ENG } #Tel Aviv
				}
				alliance = { country = GER country = TUR }
				alliance = { country = GER country = PER }
			}
		}
		random = 35
	}

	name = "EVT_100003_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_100003_DESC"
	style = 0

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1938 } #In case of early war
	offset = 21
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_100003_ACTA"
		ai_chance = 80
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = end_puppet }
		command = { type = leave_alliance }
		command = { type = end_access which = ENG }
		command = { type = peace which = GER value = 1 }
		command = { type = access which = GER }
		command = { type = access which = ITA }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = 50 }
		command = { type = relation which = SYR value = 50 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -100 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -50 }

		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 2 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 3 }
		##Governmental changes##
		command = { type = headofstate which = 91011 } #Rashid Ali
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 91052 } #Rashid Ali
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 91077 } #Haj Amini al-Husseini
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 91100 } #Fawsi al Kaukji
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 91108 } #Suleiman al Taji
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 91131 } #Azam Pasha
		command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 91143 } #Fawsi al Kaukji
		command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 91154 } #Adbullah
		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 91160 } #Ali Mahmud al Shaykh
		command = { type = chiefofair which = 91170 } #Fahmi Said
		##Diplomatic stuff##
		command = { type = trigger which = 100004 } #UK event
		command = { type = trigger which = 100005 } #GER event
		command = { type = trigger which = 100006 } #VIC event
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "EVT_100003_ACTB"
		ai_chance = 20
		command = { type = dissent value = 20 }
		command = { type = war which = SYR }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 25 }
		command = { type = relation which = SYR value = -100 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -50 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = 10 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 5 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 5 }
		##New Government##
		command = { type = headofstate which = 91036 } #Amir al Illah (SC)
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 91177 } #Nuri as Said
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 91060 } #Moussa al Alami
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 91090 } #Ya'goub Farraj
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 91109 } #Robert H Brand
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 91125 } #John Sanderson-Haldane
		command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 91138 } #John Glubb
		command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 91008 } #Frederick Peake
		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 91009 } #ARH Nye
		command = { type = chiefofair which = 91164 } #Allan Rawlinson
		##Army revolts##
		command = { type = switch_allegiance which = -1 where = SYR }
		command = { type = switch_allegiance which = -1 where = SYR }
		command = { type = switch_allegiance which = -1 where = SYR }
		##Diplomatic stuff##
		command = { type = trigger which = 100005 } #GER event
		command = { type = trigger which = 100006 } #VIC event
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Persian Coup
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 936
	random = no
	country = PER

	trigger = {
		random = 25
		lost_national = { country = SOV value = 5 }
        war = { country = GER country = ENG }
        war = { country = GER country = SOV }
        NOT = {
			war = { country = ENG country = SOV }
			alliance = { country = ENG country = PER }
			alliance = { country = SOV country = PER }
			war = { country = PER country = ENG }
			war = { country = PER country = SOV }
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_112_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_112_DESC"
	picture = "coup"
	style = 0

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1938 }
	offset = 17
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		ai_chance = 99
		command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
		command = { type = leave_alliance }
		command = { type = access which = ENG }
		command = { type = access which = SOV }
		command = { type = end_trades which = PER where = GER }
		command = { type = set_relation which = GER value = -50 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = SOV value = 25 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = ENG value = 100 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 4 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 5 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = freedom value = 3 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = free_market value = 5 }
#		command = { type = set_domestic which = professional_army value = 3 } # BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = set_domestic which = defense_lobby value = 5 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = interventionism value = 6 }
		command = { type = headofstate which = 53031 } # Mohammed Reza Pahlavi
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 53035 } # Mohammed Ali Foroughi
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 53048 } # Ali Zohayli
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 53064 } # Sayyid al-Din Tabataba'i
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 53074 } # Mohammed Bahrami
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 53085 } # Sir Neville Grantleigh

##########################################################################
#  700000 - USSR RETURNS PERSIAN PROVINCES TO PERSIA IF BAKU IS LOST
##########################################################################
event = {
	id = 700000
	random = no
	country = SOV

	trigger = {
		owned = { province = 1859 data = SOV } # USSR owns Tabriz
		owned = { province = 1787 data = SOV } # USSR owns Rasht
		owned = { province = 1788 data = SOV } # USSR owns Hamadan
		owned = { province = 1503 data = SOV } # USSR owns Babol
		owned = { province = 1501 data = SOV } # USSR owns Dasht-i-Kavir
		owned = { province = 1500 data = SOV } # USSR owns Mashhad
		event = 936 # Persia ceded provinces to USSR and became an English puppet
		puppet = { country = PER country = ENG } # Persia became an English puppet in 936
		war = { country = GER country = SOV }
		NOT = {
			control = { province = 1907 data = SOV } # USSR lost Baku
			war = { country = SOV country = PER }
			war = { country = SOV country = ENG }
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_700000_NAME" # needs text
	desc = "EVT_700000_DESC"
	picture = "reinforcements"
	style = 0

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 2
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = PER value = 1859 } # Tabriz
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = PER value = 1787 } # Rasht
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = PER value = 1788 } # Hamaden
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = PER value = 1503 } # Babol
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = PER value = 1501 } # Dasht-i-Kavir
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = PER value = 1500 } # Mashhad
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = PER value = 3883 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = PER value = 3949 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = PER value = 3886 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = PER value = 3885 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = PER value = 3890 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = PER value = 3889 }	
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = PER value = 3887 }	
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = PER value = 3884 }		
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = PER value = 3888 }
	
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  UK Events
#########################################################################
#  Guarantee Independence to Poland
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 3401
	random = no
	country = ENG

	trigger = {
		exists = POL
		exists = GER
		OR = {
			event = 2006 #  The End of Czechoslovakia - Czechs annexed
			event = 2007 #  The End of Czechoslovakia - Czechs wish a fight!
			event = 2011 #  The End of Czechoslovakia - Czecho-Slovakia partitioned
			event = 2012 #  The End of Czechoslovakia - Czechs fight!
		}
		NOT = {
			ispuppet = ENG
			alliance = { country = POL country = SOV }
			alliance = { country = POL country = GER }
			alliance = { country = POL country = ENG }
			atwar = POL
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_3401_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3401_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "guarantee_POL"

	date = { day = 29 month = march year = 1939 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 100
		name = "ACTIONNAME3401A" # Poland must be protected
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = relation which = POL value = 25 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -15 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3600 } # POL
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 0
		name = "ACTIONNAME3401B" # The world must be spared another Great War
		command = { type = dissent value = 15 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -2 }
		command = { type = relation which = POL value = -25 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = 15 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3603 } # POL
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Churchill becomes Prime Minister
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 65
	random = no
	country = ENG

	name = EVT_65_NAME
	desc = EVT_65_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "churchill"

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			war = { country = ENG country = GER }
			war = { country = ENG country = SOV }
		}
		government = democratic
		OR = {
			war = { country = ENG country = SOV }
			control = { province = 56 data = GER } #Paris in German hands
			control = { province = 51 data = GER } #Brussels in German hands
			control = { province = 107 data = GER } #Oslo in German hands
		}
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 99
		name = EVT_65_ACTA
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 }
		command = { type = money value = 500 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 10 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 2 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 2 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 1038 }
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 1003 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = EVT_65_ACTB
		command = { type = dissent value = 2 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = -1 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 1157 } #Halifax
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 1158 } #Templewood
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 1060 } #Simon
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 1159 } #Anderson
	}
}

event = {
	id = 13
	random = no
	country = GER

	name = EVT_13_NAME
	desc = EVT_13_DESC
	picture = "partition_of_england"
	style = 0

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			control = { province = 56 data = GER } #Paris
			NOT = {
				war = { country = FRA country = GER }
			}
		}
		control = { province = 19 data = GER } #London
		lost_VP = { country = ENG value = 75 }
		lost_IC = { country = ENG value = 75 }
		NOT = {
			war = { country = USA country = GER }
			war = { country = SOV country = GER }
		}
		random = 50
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 10
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 50
		name = EVT_13_ACTA
		command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
		command = { type = end_mastery which = SCO }
		command = { type = money value = 5000 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 66 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 50
		name = EVT_13_ACTB
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 }
		command = { type = money value = 2500 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 66 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 66
	random = no
	country = ENG

	name = EVT_66_NAME
	desc = EVT_66_DESC
	style = 0

	# Triggered by German event 13

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 100 # 50
		name = EVT_66_ACTA
		command = { type = dissent value = 15 }
		command = { type = leave_alliance }
#		command = { type = peace which = GER value = 0 }							# BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = peace_with_all which = ENG }								# BHT1.5
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 3 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 3 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -50 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = ITA value = 50 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = GER value = 50 }
		#Incase Italy has taken control
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 5 } # Scapa Flow		# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 23 } # Plymouth		# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 1822 } # Kuwait City	# BHT1.5 撤销
		#IF Germany or UK has control give provinces to Germany
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 5 } # Scapa Flow
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 23 } # Plymouth
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 1822 } # Kuwait City
		#Incase Germany has control
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 31 } # Malta
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 444 } # Cyprus
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 348 } # Gibraltar
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 901 } # Port Said
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 900 } # Suez
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 1036 } # Zeila
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 1035 } # Berbera
		#If Italy or UK control give them to Italy.(except gibraltar goes to spain if UK controls))
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 31 } # Malta
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 444 } # Cyprus
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 348 } # Gibraltar
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 901 } # Port Said
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 900 } # Suez
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 1036 } # Zeila
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 1035 } # Berbera
		#Incase Nat Spain or UK control Gibraltar give it to spain.
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = SPA value = 348 } # Gibraltar
		#Incase Italy control
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 576 } # Newfoundland
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 575 } # Labrador
		#Incase Germany control
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 576 } # Newfoundland
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 575 } # Labrador
		#If UK still controlls, Canada takes control
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = CAN value = 576 } # Newfoundland
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = CAN value = 575 } # Labrador
		#Incase Italy has taken Caribbean
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 538 } # Bermuda		# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 758 } # Belize		# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 891 } # Jamaica		# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 652 } # Andros		# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 653 } # New providence# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 664 } # Grand Bahama	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 665 } # Abacos		# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 666 } # Eleuthera		# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ITA value = 668 } # Long Island	# BHT1.5 撤销
		#Incase Germany has taken Caribbean
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 538 } # Bermuda
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 758 } # Belize
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 891 } # Jamaica
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 652 } # Andros
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 653 } # New providence
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 664 } # Grand Bahama
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 665 } # Abacos
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 666 } # Eleuthera
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = GER value = 668 } # Long Island

		command = { type = secedeprovince which = USA value = 538 } # Bermuda
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = USA value = 758 } # Belize
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = USA value = 891 } # Jamaica
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = USA value = 652 } # Andros
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = USA value = 653 } # New providence

		command = { type = secedeprovince which = USA value = 668 } # Long Island

event = {
	id = 2789
	random = no
	country = FRA
	persistent = yes # BHT1.5
	
	name = "EVT_2789_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2789_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "fort_sabotaged"

	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			exists = VIC
#			control = { province = 64 data = FRA } # Reims			# BHT1.5 撤销
#			control = { province = 317 data = FRA } # Chaumont		# BHT1.5 撤销
#			control = { province = 63 data = FRA } # Troyes			# BHT1.5 撤销
#			control = { province = 53 data = FRA } # Valenciennes	# BHT1.5 撤销
#			control = { province = 55 data = FRA } # Compigne		# BHT1.5 撤销
			control = { province = 3051 data = FRA }				# BHT1.5
			AND = {													# BHT1.5
				control = { province = 3052 data = FRA }			# BHT1.5
				control = { province = 3053 data = FRA }			# BHT1.5
			}														# BHT1.5
			control = { province = 3054 data = FRA }				# BHT1.5
		}
		NOT = { flag = MaginotLine }								# BHT1.5
	}

	date = { day = 2 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 2 # Check for trigger conditions day
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1940 }

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_2789_ACTA" #

		command = { type = construct which = land_fort where = 73 value = -7 }
		command = { type = construct which = land_fort where = 316 value = -7 }
		command = { type = setflag which = MaginotLine }	# BHT1.5
	}
}

	country = GER

#		control = { province = 56 data = -1 } # Paris BHT1.5 撤销
		control = { province = 56 data = -3 } # BHT1.5 (modify from -1 to -3)
		lost_national = { country = FRA value = 25 }
#		OR = {																	# MIH 撤销
#			random = 25															# MIH 撤销
#			lost_national = { country = FRA value = 40 }						# MIH 撤销
#		}																		# MIH 撤销
#		OR = {																	# MIH 撤销
#			control = { province = 320 data = FRA } # France controls Vichy		# MIH 撤销
#			control = { province = 320 data = GER } # Germany controls Vichy	# MIH 撤销
#		}																		# MIH 撤销
		control = { province = 43 data = -3 } # Dunkerque	# MIH & BHT1.5 (modify from -1 to -3)
		or = {												# MIH
			lost_national = { country = FRA value = 70 }	# MIH
			and = { 										# MIH
				control = { province = 72 data = -3 }		# MIH & BHT1.5 (modify from -1 to -3)
				control = { province = 73 data = -3 }		# MIH & BHT1.5 (modify from -1 to -3)
				control = { province = 316 data = -3 }		# MIH & BHT1.5 (modify from -1 to -3)
			} 												# MIH
			ai = yes 										# MIH
		}													# MIH
		war = { country = GER country = FRA }
		NOT = {
			year = 1942
			war = { country = GER country = SOV }
			puppet = { country = VIC country = GER }
			puppet = { country = FRA country = GER }
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_2021_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2021_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "VIC"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 3 # Check for trigger conditions every three days
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2021A" # Set up French Puppet Government in Vichy
		ai_chance = 100
		command = { type = trigger which = 2800 value = 1 } # FRA
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2021B" # Total conquest is preferable
		ai_chance = 0
		command = { }
	}
}

		command = { type = supplies value = 2500 where = 891 }
		command = { type = oilpool value = 2500 where = 891 }

		command = { type = construct which = air_base where = 891 value = 3 }
		command = { type = construct which = naval_base where = 891 value = 7 }

		command = { type = add_corps which = "北非空军联队 " value = air where = 1075 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "海军轰炸机2中队 " value = naval_bomber when = 1 }

		command = { type = add_corps which = "自由法国第2舰队 " value = naval where = 891 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "黎塞留号 " value = battleship when = 3 }	
		command = { type = add_division which = "乔治・莱格号 " value = light_cruiser when = 3 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "光荣号 " value = light_cruiser when = 3 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "蒙卡尔姆号 " value = light_cruiser when = 3 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "第1驱逐舰队 " value = destroyer when = 0 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "第2驱逐舰队 " value = destroyer when = 1 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "第3潜艇舰队 " value = submarine when = 1 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "第4潜艇舰队 " value = submarine when = 1 }
	}

#########################################################################
#  Liberation of France-Metropolitain and Africa-not Indochina
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 2802
	random = no
	country = FRA

	#triggered by GER event

	name = "EVT_2802_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2802_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "Fra_Liberated"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK" # Vive la France!
		command = { type = dissent value = -100 }
		command = { type = inherit which = VIC }
		command = { type = capital which = 56 }
		##Algeria added as cores##
#		command = { type = addcore which = 953 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 952 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 970 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 942 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 943 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 944 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 945 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 946 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 947 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 948 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 949 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 950 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 951 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 969 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 970 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 1013 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 1014 } # BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 8 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 3 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = 1 }
		command = { type = headofstate which = 2031 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 2046 }
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 2056 }
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 2089 }
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 2115 }
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 2136 }
		command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 2152 }
		command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 2164 }
		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 2178 }
		command = { type = chiefofair which = 2194 }

#		command = { type = free_ic value = 0 }					# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = free_energy value = 0 }				# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = free_metal value = 0 }				# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = free_oil value = 0 }					# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = free_rare_materials value = 0 }		# BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = free_ic value = -15 }				# BHT1.5
		command = { type = free_energy value = -60 }			# BHT1.5
		command = { type = free_metal value = -30 }				# BHT1.5
		command = { type = free_rare_materials value = -15 }	# BHT1.5
		command = { type = free_oil value = -20 }				# BHT1.5
		command = { type = free_supplies value = -50 }			# BHT1.5
		command = { type = free_money value = -10 }				# BHT1.5

		command = { type = trigger which = 49047 } # BHT1.5 French Aviation Resources
	}
}

##################################################################################
# 700001 - FRANCE RETURNS ITS CAPITAL TO PARIS AFTER GERMANY HAS BEEN DEFEATED
##################################################################################
event = {
	id = 700001
	random = no
	country = FRA

	name = "EVT_700001_NAME" # needs text
	desc = "EVT_700001_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "ger_surrender"

	trigger = {
		NOT = { exists = GER }
		owned = { province = 56 data = FRA }
		event = 2800 # The Vichy Regime
	}

	date = { day = 2 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 1 # Check for trigger conditions day
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "OK" #
		ai_chance = 100
		command = { type = capital which = 56 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 49047 } # BHT1.5 French Aviation Resources
	}
}

#  Netherlands and Belgium Events
###########################################################################
#  Netherlands move capital to the Dutch East Indies when nearly conquered (Edited by 兰々)
###########################################################################
event = {
	id = 25066
	random = no
	country = HOL

	trigger = {

###################################################################################################
#  700002 - THE NETHERLANDS MOVE THEIR CAPITAL BACK TO AMSTERDAM AFTER GERMANY HAS BEEN DEFEATED
###################################################################################################
event = {
	id = 700002
	random = no
	country = HOL

	name = "EVT_700002_NAME" # needs text
	desc = "EVT_700002_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "ger_surrender"

	trigger = {
		NOT = { exists = GER }
		owned = { province = 47 data = HOL }
		OR = {
			event = 37069 # HOL moves their capital
			event = 25066 # Netherlands move capital to the Dutch East Indies when nearly conquered
		}
	}

	date = { day = 2 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 1 # Check for trigger conditions day
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "OK" #
		ai_chance = 100
		command = { type = capital which = 47 }
#		command = { type = addcore which = 46 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 47 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 48 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 49 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 77 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 78 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 79 } # BHT1.5 撤销
	}
}

################################################################
#  Belgium moves its capital to the Kongo when nearly conquered (Edited by 兰々)
################################################################
event = {
	id = 25060
	random = no
	country = BEL

	trigger = {
		random = 35
		war = { country = GER country = BEL }
		NOT = {
			control = { province = 50 data = BEL }
			control = { province = 68 data = BEL }
			control = { province = 69 data = BEL }
			control = { province = 51 data = BEL }
			control = { province = 52 data = BEL }
			control = { province = 70 data = BEL }
			control = { province = 65 data = BEL }
			control = { province = 45 data = BEL }
			control = { province = 3055 data = BEL } # BHT1.5
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_2809_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_2809_DESC"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 3
	deathdate = { day = 1 month = december year = 1946 }

		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 10 }

####################################################################################################################
#  700003 - BELGIUM MOVES ITS CAPITAL BACK TO BRUSSELS AFTER GERMANY HAS BEEN DEFEATED & LOSES CORES ON THE CONGO
####################################################################################################################
event = {
	id = 700003
	random = no
	country = BEL

	name = "EVT_700003_NAME" # needs text
	desc = "EVT_700003_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "ger_surrender"

	trigger = {
		NOT = { exists = GER }
		owned = { province = 51 data = BEL }
		OR = {
			event = 37162 # BEL moves their capital
			event = 25060 # Belgium moves its capital to the Kongo when nearly conquered
		}
	}

	date = { day = 2 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 1 # Check for trigger conditions day
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "OK" #
		ai_chance = 100
		command = { type = capital which = 51 }
#		command = { type = addcore which = 45 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 50 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 51 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 52 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 65 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 68 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 69 } # BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = addcore which = 70 } # BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = removecore which = 1095 }
		command = { type = removecore which = 1142 }
		command = { type = removecore which = 1098 }
		command = { type = removecore which = 1127 }
		command = { type = removecore which = 1144 }
		command = { type = removecore which = 1143 }
		command = { type = removecore which = 1074 }
		command = { type = removecore which = 1071 }
		command = { type = removecore which = 1072 }
		command = { type = removecore which = 1073 }
		command = { type = removecore which = 1063 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  USA Events
#########################################################################
#  The US gears up for war (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 56
	random = no
	country = USA

	name = EVT_56_NAME
	desc = EVT_56_DESC
	picture = "factory"
	style = 0

	trigger = {
		atwar = no
		OR = {
			belligerence = { country = SOV value = 35 }
			belligerence = { country = GER value = 35 }
			belligerence = { country = JAP value = 40 }
			puppet = { country = CHI country = JAP }
			alliance = { country = MEX  country = GER }
			access = { country = MEX country = GER }
			alliance = { country = MEX  country = SOV }
			access = { country = MEX country = SOV }
			alliance = { country = MEX  country = JAP }
			access = { country = MEX country = JAP }
			alliance = { country = MEX  country = ITA }
			access = { country = MEX country = ITA }
			under_attack = MEX
			under_attack = BRA
			control = { province = 575 data = GER } #Labrador
			control = { province = 575 data = ITA } #Labrador
			control = { province = 575 data = SOV } #Labrador
			control = { province = 575 data = JAP } #Labrador
			control = { province = 576 data = GER } #New Foundland
			control = { province = 576 data = ITA } #New Foundland
			control = { province = 576 data = SOV } #New Foundland
			control = { province = 576 data = JAP } #New Foundland
			war = { country = ENG country = SOV }
			war = { country = ENG country = JAP }
			war = { country = JAP country = HOL }
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = CHI
					control = { province = 19 data = ENG } # London
					control = { province = 56 data = FRA } # Paris
					control = { province = 175 data = SOV } # Moscow
					control = { province = 515 data = ITA } # Rome
					control = { province = 300 data = GER } # Berlin
					control = { province = 541 data = CAN } #Vancover
					control = { province = 556 data = CAN } #Vancover Island
					control = { province = 574 data = CAN } #Sept=Illes
					control = { province = 586 data = CAN } #Quebec City
					control = { province = 1909 data = CAN } #Rivere-du-Loup
					control = { province = 579 data = CAN } #Moncton
					control = { province = 580 data = CAN } #Halifax
					control = { province = 578 data = CAN } #Cape Brenton
					control = { province = 563 data = CAN } #Bafin Island
				}
			}
		}
		random = 15
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1936 }
    offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 99
		name = EVT_56_ACTA
#		command = { type = domestic which = professional_army value = -1 } # BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 620 value = 3 }
		command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = 25 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 3 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 200 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = EVT_56_ACTB
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = -1 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 50 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 57
	random = no
	country = USA

	name = EVT_57_NAME
	desc = EVT_57_DESC
	picture = "factory"
	style = 0

		atwar = no
		OR = {

			comintern = 200														# BHT1.5

			access = { country = MEX country = SOV }

			NOT = {
				AND = {
					control = { province = 541 data = CAN } #Vancover
					control = { province = 556 data = CAN } #Vancover Island
					control = { province = 574 data = CAN } #Sept=Illes

				}
			}
		}
		random = 10
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1936 }

	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 99
		name = EVT_57_ACTA
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
#		command = { type = domestic which = professional_army value = -1 }

		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 620 value = 3 }
		command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = 15 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 100 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = EVT_57_ACTB
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = -1 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 25 }
	}
}
