event = {
	id = 2651
	random = no
	country = SOV

	trigger = {
#		NOT = { event = 2657 } # BHT1.5 撤销
		OR = {
			year = 1939
			atwar = GER
			lost_national = { country = SOV value = 2 }
		}
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 7
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = june year = 1939 }

	name = "USSR_GEAR_1"
	desc = "USSR_GEAR_2"
	style = 0	
	picture = "soviet_strategic_victory"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = ground_def_eff value = 0.3 } # 0.3 rise
	}
}

event = {
	id = 2652
	random = no
	country = SOV

	trigger = {
#		NOT = { event = 2657 } # BHT1.5 撤销
		OR = {
			AND = {
				year = 1939
				month = 5 # June
			}
			NOT = { exists = POL }
			alliance = { country = GER country = POL }
			NOT = { control = { province = 56 data = FRA } } # Paris
			lost_national = { country = SOV value = 4 }
		}
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 7
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1939 }

	name = "USSR_GEAR_1"
	desc = "USSR_GEAR_2"
	style = 0	
	picture = "soviet_strategic_victory"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = ground_def_eff value = 0.4 } # 0.4 rise
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2651 }
	}
}

event = { # Final Raise for all GCs AI or Human
	id = 2656
	random = no
	country = SOV
	style = 0

	picture = "soviet_strategic_victory"

	trigger = {
#		NOT = { event = 2657 } # BHT1.5 撤销
		OR = {
			AND = {
				year = 1942
				month = 5 # June
			}
			lost_national = { country = SOV value = 8 }
			AND = {
				ai = yes
				OR = {
					war = { country = SOV country = GER }
					war = { country = SOV country = JAP }
					war = { country = SOV country = CHI }
					war = { country = SOV country = ENG }
					war = { country = SOV country = USA }
					war = { country = SOV country = FRA }
				}
			}
			AND = {																				# BHT1.5 原event 2657部分
				ai = no																			# BHT1.5
				under_attack = SOV																# BHT1.5
				OR = {																			# BHT1.5
					war = { country = SOV country = GER }										# BHT1.5
					war = { country = SOV country = ITA }										# BHT1.5
					war = { country = SOV country = ENG }										# BHT1.5
					war = { country = SOV country = USA }										# BHT1.5
					war = { country = SOV country = FRA }										# BHT1.5
					war = { country = SOV country = JAP }										# BHT1.5
					war = { country = SOV country = CHI }										# BHT1.5
				}																				# BHT1.5
				lost_national = { country = SOV value = 5 }										# BHT1.5
				NOT = {																			# BHT1.5
					AND = {																		# BHT1.5
						control = { province = 189 data = SOV }	# Novgorod for SOV				# BHT1.5
						control = { province = 219 data = SOV } # Smolensk for SOV				# BHT1.5
						control = { province = 238 data = SOV } # Kiev for SOV					# BHT1.5
						control = { province = 253 data = SOV } # Sevastopol for SOV			# BHT1.5
						control = { province = 1372 data = SOV } # Vladivostok for SOV			# BHT1.5
					}																			# BHT1.5
				}																				# BHT1.5
				random = 10																		# BHT1.5
			}																					# BHT1.5
		}
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 7
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1942 }

	name = "USSR_GEAR_1"
	desc = "USSR_GEAR_2"
	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = ground_def_eff value = 0.8 } # 0.8 rise
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2651 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2652 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2653 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2654 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2655 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  The 2-2-6 incident (Japan)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 1
	random = no
	country = JAP

	name = EVT_1_NAME
	desc = EVT_1_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "226"

	trigger = {
		atwar = no
		NOT = {
			ispuppet = JAP
		}
	}

	date = { day = 25 month = february year = 1936 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 100
		name = EVT_1_ACTA
		command = { type = dissent value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 3 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 4 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -1 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 0
		name = EVT_1_ACTB
		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 2 }  #  NOTE: The B choice effects are stronger than A by design
		command = { type = domestic which = democratic value = -3 }      #  This represent a greater shift towards the military and
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = -3 }  #  right wing control.
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -3 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = headofstate which = 5001 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 5033 }
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 5053 }
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 5080 }
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 5105 }
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 5134 }
		command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 5007 }
		command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 5008 }
		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 5172 }
		command = { type = chiefofair which = 5183 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = CHI value = -10 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Panay Incident
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 80
	random = no
	country = JAP

	name = EVT_80_NAME
	desc = EVT_80_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "panay"

	trigger = {
		random = 50
		war = { country = JAP country = CHI }
		control = { province = 1235 data = JAP }
		NOT = {
			war = { country = JAP country = USA }
		}
	}

	date = { day = 5 month = may year = 1937 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = august year = 1939 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 99
		name = EVT_80_ACTA
		command = { type = money value = -500 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -1 }
#		command = { type = belligerence which = JAP value = -1 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -5 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 81 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = EVT_80_ACTB
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 } #
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = JAP value = 1 }
		command = { type = war which = usa }
	}
}

	id = 81
	random = no
	country = USA

	name = EVT_81_NAME
	desc = EVT_81_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "panay"

	# Triggered by Japan event 80

	action_a = {
		name = EVT_81_ACTA
		command = { type = dissent value = 1 } #
		command = { type = money value = 500 }
		command = { type = relation which = JAP value = -5 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Japan prepares to setup Mengkukuo in former Shanxi area (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
#地图已修改
event = {
	id = 3832
	random = no
	country = JAP

	trigger = {
		# Mengukuo area:
		control = { province = 1207 data = -3 } # Jining
		control = { province = 1208 data = -3 } # Hohhot
		control = { province = 1386 data = -3 } # Xilinhot
		control = { province = 1398 data = -3 } # Erenhot
		control = { province = 1206 data = -3 } # BHT1.5
		control = { province = 2813 data = -3 } # BHT1.5
		control = { province = 2815 data = -3 } # BHT1.5
		control = { province = 2816 data = -3 } # BHT1.5
		control = { province = 2817 data = -3 } # BHT1.5
		control = { province = 2939 data = -3 } # BHT1.5
		control = { province = 2941 data = -3 } # BHT1.5
		control = { province = 2942 data = -3 } # BHT1.5
		control = { province = 2943 data = -3 } # BHT1.5
		control = { province = 2944 data = -3 } # BHT1.5
		control = { province = 2947 data = -3 } # BHT1.5

		# Provinces surrounding Mengukuo area:
		control = { province = 1205 data = -3 } # Beiping
		control = { province = 1210 data = -3 } # Baoding
		control = { province = 1211 data = -3 } # Shijiazhuang
	}

	name = "EVT_3832_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3832_DESC"
	style = 0

	date = { year = 1936 month = january day = 1 }
	offset = 7 # BHT1.5
	deathdate = { year = 1948 month = january day = 3 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 99
		name = "EVT_3832_ACTA" #Prepare better action name
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -5 }
		command = { type = independence which = MEN value = 1 }
		command = { type = alliance which = MEN }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3834 } # Setup Mengukuo
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = "EVT_3823_ACTB" # Let us take it all!
		command = { type = supplies value = 100 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = JAP value = 5 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Mengukuo country setup (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 3834
	random = no
	country = MEN

	# triggered by JAP3832

	name = "EVT_3834_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3834_DESC"
	style = 0

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_2717_ACTA"
		#Diplomacy:
		command = { type = alliance which = MAN }
		command = { type = alliance which = U74 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = alliance which = U87 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = access which = JAP }
		command = { type = access which = MAN }
		command = { type = access which = U74 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = access which = U87 } # BHT1.5
		#Government:
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 2 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 3 }
		command = { type = headofstate which = 513001 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 513002 }
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 513003 }
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 513004 }
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 513005 }
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 513006 }
		command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 513007 }
		command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 513008 }
		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 513009 }
		command = { type = chiefofair which = 513010 }
		command = { type = change_idea which = policy_economy_colonial value = men }
		command = { type = change_idea which = policy_social_self-movement value = men }
		command = { type = change_idea which = policy_political_nationalism value = men }				
		#Army:
		command = { type = add_corps which = "蒙疆兵团 " value = land where = 1208 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "卫戍军 " value = militia when = 0 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "第1蒙古军 " value = cavalry when = 1 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "西绥远联合军 " value = infantry when = 0 }
		#Resources:
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 100 } 	# manpower
		command = { type = trigger which = 3833 } # Japan Puppet Mengukuo
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Japan installs puppet government in Mengukuo
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 3833
	random = no
	country = JAP
	
	#Triggered by JAP 3834
	
	name = "EVT_3833_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3833_DESC"
	style = 0

	action_a = {
		name = "OK" # Install a Puppet
		command = { type = make_puppet which = MEN }
#		command = { type = secedeprovince which = MEN value = 1386 } # Xilinhot to Mengukuo	# BHT1.5 撤销

    command = { type = add_corps which = "大日本帝-v蒙 " value = land where = 2942 }
    command = { type = activate_division which = 13016 value = 2413 where = 2942 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "v蒙-第18境警潢 " value = militia when = 2 where = armored_car }
	}
}

####################################################################
#  Japan Pressures Germany over Manchukuo (Edited by 兰々)
####################################################################
event = {
	id = 3835
	random = no
	country = JAP

	trigger = {
		exists = CHI
		exists = GER
		OR = {
			war = { country = JAP country = CHI }
			alliance = { country = GER country = JAP }
			event = 21
		}
		NOT = {
			alliance = { country = GER country = CHI }
			alliance = { country = GER country = CYN }
			alliance = { country = GER country = CSX }
			alliance = { country = GER country = CGX } # BHT1.5
			alliance = { country = GER country = CXB }
			alliance = { country = GER country = SIK }
			alliance = { country = GER country = U01 } # BHT1.5
			alliance = { country = GER country = U02 } # BHT1.5
			war = { country = GER country = JAP }
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_3835_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3835_DESC"
	style = 0

	date = { day = 0 month = february year = 1938 }
	offset = 14
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = august year = 1939 }

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_3835_ACTA"
		command = { type = money value = -50 } #Expenditure
		command = { type = relation which = MAN value = 20 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -10 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 2035 } #GER response
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "EVT_3835_ACTB"
		command = { type = dissent value = 1 }
		command = { type = relation which = MAN value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = CHI value = 5 }
	}
}

#####################################
# German response to Japanese pressure over Manchuria (Edited by 兰々)
#####################################
event = {
	id = 2035
	random = no
	country = GER

	#Triggered by JAP3835A

	#Already some text for an event 2035 so naming it b
	name = "EVT_2035B_NAME" #"Recognition of Manchukuo"
	desc = "EVT_2035B_DESC" #"Amid the international non-recognition of her Manchurian puppet, Japan requested that the German government, as a show of friendship, recognize the State of Manchukuo and establish formal diplomatic relations with her.  Germany recognized that such a move would be a serious blow to her relations with Nationalist China, who considered Manchukuo an outright violation of her national sovereignty.  As such, German advisors in China would likely be expelled from the country and German assistance or advice would no longer be welcome.  However, relations with Japan would be solidified."
	style = 0

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2035A" #"Recognize Manchukuo, recall Von Falkenhausen"
		command = { type = relation which = JAP value = 50 }
		command = { type = relation which = MAN value = 20 }
		command = { type = relation which = CHI value = -200 }
		command = { type = end_trades which = GER where = CHI }
		command = { type = giveleader which = 50304 where = GER } #Von Falkenhausen	# BHT1.5
		command = { type = trigger which = 4103 } #CHI Event
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME2035B" #"Ignore the Japanese demands"
		command = { type = relation which = JAP value = -100 }
		command = { type = relation which = MAN value = -100 }
		command = { type = relation which = CHI value = 50 }
#		command = { type = sleepleader which = 293 } #Von Falkenhausen # BHT1.5 撤销
	}
}

	country = JAP

	desc = EVT_24_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "chanfukeng"

	trigger = {
		random = 10
		puppet = { country = MAN country = JAP }
		NOT = {
			war = { country = JAP country = SOV }
			war = { country = GER country = SOV }
			alliance = { country = JAP country = SOV }
		}
	}

	date = { day = 15 month = july year = 1938 }
	offset = 3
	deathdate = { day = 20 month = september year = 1938 }

	action_a = {
		name = EVT_24_ACTA
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = -3 }
		command = { type = supplies value = -500 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 25 }
	}
}

	id = 22
	random = no
	country = JAP

	# Historical event May to August 1939
	# http://ibiblio.org/pha/monos/144/144chap4.html#Nomonham Incident (May - August 1939)

	name = EVT_22_NAME
	desc = EVT_22_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "Nomonhan"

	trigger = {
		random = 20
		puppet = { country = MAN country = JAP }
		NOT = {
			war = { country = JAP country = SOV }
			war = { country = GER country = SOV }
			alliance = { country = JAP country = SOV }
		}
	}

	date = { day = 11 month = may year = 1939 }
	offset = 6
	deathdate = { day = 20 month = october year = 1939 }

	action_a = {
		name = EVT_22_ACTA
		ai_chance = 99
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = non_aggression which = JAP where = SOV }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = -100 }
		command = { type = supplies value = -4000 }	
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -10 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 } # one step Hawk intentional
		command = { type = trigger which = 23 }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = EVT_22_ACTB
		ai_chance = 1
#		command = { type = dissent value = 1 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = -100 }
		command = { type = supplies value = -4000 }
		command = { type = alliance which = MAN }
		command = { type = alliance which = MEN }
		command = { type = war which = SOV }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 2 }  # two steps Hawk
		command = { type = trigger which = 23 }
	}
}

#  Japan and the SE Asian Colonies of Vichy France (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 3803
	random = no
	country = JAP

	trigger = {
		event = 69906	# BHT1.5 Independent Vichy France

		control = { province = 1306 data = VIC } # Vichy controls Indochine and Madagascar
		control = { province = 1326 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1328 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1329 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1332 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1333 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1334 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1335 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1336 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1337 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1338 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1339 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1340 data = VIC }

		NOT = {
			alliance = { country = JAP country = ENG }
			alliance = { country = JAP country = GER }
			war = { country = FRA country = JAP }
			event = 3826 # CHI落日
			event = 2414 # CHC落日 # Enhanced by Miborovsky # Edited by Duke_of_BOOM! for CCIP
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_3803_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3803_DESC"
	picture = "asian_colonies"
	style = 0

	date = { day = 22 month = september year = 1936 }		# BHT1.5
	offset = 7												# BHT1.5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }	# BHT1.5

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME3803B" # Demand French Indochine
		ai_chance = 99
		command = { type = relation which = VIC value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -20 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -15 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -15 }
		command = { type = relation which = CGX value = -25 }
		command = { type = relation which = CYN value = -20 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 4001 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3707 } # USA - war entry raised
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 3850 } # BHT1.5
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME3803A" # Demand Airbases in French Indochine
		ai_chance = 0
		command = { type = relation which = VIC value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -15 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = CGX value = -20 }
		command = { type = relation which = CYN value = -15 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 4000 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 3850 } # BHT1.5
	}
	action_c = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME3803C" # Demand French Indochine and Madagascar
		ai_chance = 1
		command = { type = relation which = VIC value = -15 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -25 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -20 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -20 }
		command = { type = relation which = CGX value = -25 }
		command = { type = relation which = CYN value = -20 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 4002 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3708 } # USA - war entry raised more
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 3850 } # BHT1.5
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Japan and the SE Asian Colonies of Vichy France - Axis Japan (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 3850
	random = no
	country = JAP

	# Triggered by FRA 2800
	
	trigger = {
		event = 4003	# BHT1.5 Independent Vichy France

		control = { province = 1306 data = VIC } # Vichy controls Indochine and Madagascar
		control = { province = 1326 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1328 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1329 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1332 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1333 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1334 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1335 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1336 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1337 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1338 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1339 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1340 data = VIC }
		control = { province = 1341 data = VIC }
		NOT = {
			alliance = { country = JAP country = ENG }
		}
		alliance = { country = JAP country = GER }
	}

	name = "EVT_3803_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3803_DESC"
	picture = "asian_colonies"
	style = 0

	date = { day = 22 month = september year = 1940 }		# BHT1.5
	offset = 3												# BHT1.5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }	# BHT1.5

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME3803C" # Demand French Indochine and Madagascar
		ai_chance = 98
		command = { type = relation which = VIC value = -15 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -20 }
		command = { type = relation which = CGX value = -25 }
		command = { type = relation which = CYN value = -20 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 4002 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3708 } # USA - war entry raised more
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 3803 } # BHT1.5
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME3803B" # Demand French Indochine
		ai_chance = 1
		command = { type = relation which = VIC value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -15 }
		command = { type = relation which = CGX value = -25 }
		command = { type = relation which = CYN value = -20 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 4001 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3707 } # USA - war entry raised
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 3803 } # BHT1.5
	}
	action_c = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME3803A" # Demand Airbases in French Indochine
		ai_chance = 1
		command = { type = relation which = VIC value = -5 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = CGX value = -25 }
		command = { type = relation which = CYN value = -20 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 4000 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 3803 } # BHT1.5
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Oil Embargo against Japan	
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 3701
	random = no
	country = USA

	trigger = {	
		AND = {
			OR = {
      			event = 3707 # Japan demands French Indochine from Vichy
      			event = 3708 # Japan demands French Indochine and Madagascar from Vichy
      			belligerence = { country = JAP value = 20 }
      			war = { country = ENG country = JAP }
			}
			NOT = {
				war = { country = USA country = JAP }
				alliance = { country = JAP country = ENG }
				alliance = { country = JAP country = FRA }
			}
		}	
		OR = {
			atwar = JAP
			AND = {
				ispuppet = CHI
				puppet = { country = CHI country = JAP } #日本已经征服中国 (by civdemof)
			}
		}
		government = democratic
		random = 50
	}

	name = "EVT_3701_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3701_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "Oil_Embargo"

	date = { day = 1 month = june year = 1941 }
	offset = 30 # Check month
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME3701A" # Pass the Embargo
		ai_chance = 100
		command = { type = relation which = JAP value = -50 }
		command = { type = relation which = CHI value = 20 }
		command = { type = end_trades which = USA where = JAP }
		command = { type = end_trades which = HOL where = JAP }
		command = { type = trigger which = 3800 } #JAP
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME3701B" # Do not push the Mikado
		ai_chance = 0
		command = { type = relation which = JAP value = 15 }
		command = { type = relation which = CHI value = -10 }
	}
}

		command = { type = end_trades which = JAP where = USA }

		command = { type = end_trades which = JAP where = ENG }

		command = { type = end_trades which = JAP where = SAF }
		command = { type = end_trades which = JAP where = AST }
		command = { type = end_trades which = JAP where = NZL }
		command = { type = end_trades which = JAP where = HOL }

	}

event = {
	id = 89
	random = no
	country = JAP

	name = EVT_89_NAME
	desc = EVT_89_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "automedon"

	trigger = {
		war = { country = ENG country = GER }
		NOT = {
			war = { country = ENG country = JAP }
			war = { country = GER country = JAP }
			alliance = { country = JAP country = ENG }
		}
		random = 5
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 97
		name = EVT_89_ACTA
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = oilpool value = 1000 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -5 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 3
		name = EVT_89_ACTB
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = -1 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Pearl Harbour (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 17
	random = no
	country = JAP

	# Historical event December 1941

	name = EVT_17_NAME
	desc = EVT_17_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "Pearl_harbor"

	trigger = {
		war = { country = JAP country = USA }
		OR = {					# BHT1.5
			ai = yes			# BHT1.5
			AND = {				# BHT1.5
				oil = 1000		# BHT1.5
				supplies = 1000	# BHT1.5
				carrier = 6		# BHT1.5
			}					# BHT1.5
		}						# BHT1.5
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1939 }
	offset = 3
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1945 }

	action_a = {
		name = EVT_17_ACTA
		ai_chance = 99
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = supplies value = -1000 }										# BHT1.5
		command = { type = oilpool value = -1000 }										# BHT1.5
		command = { type = morale which = land value = 20 }								# BHT1.5
		command = { type = morale which = naval value = 20 }							# BHT1.5
		command = { type = morale which = air value = 20 }								# BHT1.5
		command = { type = task_efficiency which = amphibious_assault value = 0.1 }		# BHT1.5
		command = { type = army_detection which = them value = -10 }					# BHT1.5
		command = { type = surprise which = land value = 10 }
		command = { type = surprise which = air value = 10 }
		command = { type = surprise which = naval value = 10 }
#		command = { type = ambush value = 10 }											# BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = trigger which = 18 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = EVT_17_ACTB
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 18 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 19 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
# Surprise attack (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 18
	random = no
	country = USA

	name = EVT_18_NAME
	desc = EVT_18_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "Pearl_harbor"

	# triggered by Japanese event 17

	action_a = {
		name = EVT_18_ACTA
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 } # united against an enemy
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 3 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 4 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 250 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 50 }

		# Get From The Refence of "CinCP report of damage to ships in Pearl Harbor"
		command = { type = damage_division which = -1 where = 100 } # Pennsylvania			BHT1.5
		command = { type = damage_division which = -1 where = 100 } # Pennsylvania			BHT1.5
		command = { type = damage_division which = -1 where = 98 } # California			BHT1.5
		command = { type = damage_division which = -1 where = 98 } # West Virginia		BHT1.5
		command = { type = damage_division which = -1 where = 75 } # Nevada				BHT1.5
		command = { type = damage_division which = -1 where = 50 } # Tennessee			BHT1.5
		command = { type = damage_division which = -1 where = 50 } # Maryland				BHT1.5
		command = { type = damage_division which = -1 where = 25 } # Pennsylvania			BHT1.5
		# Helena is not exists in this scenario.
		# Honolulu is not exists in this scenario.
		command = { type = damage_division which = -1 value = 44 where = 75 } # Raleigh				BHT1.5
		# Shaw, Cassin and Downes
		command = { type = damage_division which = -1 where = 100 } # Pennsylvania			BHT1.5
		command = { type = damage_division which = -1 where = 100 } # Pennsylvania			BHT1.5
		command = { type = damage_division which = -1 where = 100 } # Pennsylvania			BHT1.5				
	}
}

	id = 3836
	random = no

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		war = { country = JAP country = USA }
		NOT = {
			event = 17
			ai = jap
			AND = {
				carrier = { country = JAP value = 6 }
				oil = 1000
				supplies = 1000
			}
		}
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1939 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1945 }

	name = "AI_EVENT"
	style = 0

	action_a = {
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 17 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 18 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 19 }
	}
}

	id = 3806
	random = no
	country = JAP

	trigger = {
		alliance = { country = JAP country = GER }
		exists = VIC
		exists = SIA
		OR = {
			event = 3802
			event = 63044 # BHT1.5
		}
		NOT = { war = { country = JAP country = SIA } }
	}
	
	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	name = "EVT_3806_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3806_DESC"

#########################################################################
# Japan puts Pressure on Siam ("Neutral" Japan)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 3807
	random = no
	country = JAP
	
	trigger = {
		war = { country = JAP country = ENG }
		exists = VIC
		exists = SIA
		OR = {
			event = 3802
			event = 63044 # BHT1.5
		}
		NOT = {
			alliance = { country = JAP country = GER }
			alliance = { country = JAP country = ENG }
			alliance = { country = JAP country = SOV }
			war = { country = JAP country = SIA }
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_3807_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3807_DESC"
	picture = "siam"
	style = 0
	
	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }
	
	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME3807A" # Lean on Siam
		ai_chance = 98
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 4501 } # Siam/Thailand

		command = { type = relation which = SIA value = 10 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 3806 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Assassination of Yamamoto (原版撤销, BHT1.5 恢复 Edited by 兰々)

event = {
	id = 3704
	random = no
	country = USA

	trigger = {
		war = { country = USA country = JAP }
		random = 10
		NOT = {											# BHT1.5
			control = { province = 662 data = JAP }		# BHT1.5 中途岛
			control = { province = 1191 data = JAP }	# BHT1.5 瓜达尔卡纳尔岛
		}												# BHT1.5
	}

	name = "EVT_3704_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3704_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "Yamamoto_Assesination"

	date = { day = 18 month = april year = 1943 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME3704A" # Assassinate him
		ai_chance = 97
		command = { type = trigger which = 3801 } #JAP
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "ACTIONNAME3704B" # That would be low
		ai_chance = 3
		command = { }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Surrender events - Partition of Japan (Edited by Civdemof and 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 43
	random = no
	country = JAP

	name = EVT_43_NAME
	desc = EVT_43_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "JAP_surrender"

	trigger = {
	  or = { 
		  war = { country = JAP country = USA }
		  war = { country = JAP country = SOV }
		  }
		war = { country = JAP country = CHI }

		OR = {
			lost_national = { country = JAP value = 50 }
			and = {
			  dissent = 50
			  lost_ic = { country = JAP value = 70 }		
			  }	 
			and = {
			  event  = 2044
			  not = { ic = 40 }	
			  }	 			   
			NOT = {
				control = { province = 1191 data = JAP }
				control = { province = 1190 data = JAP }
				control = { province = 1189 data = JAP }
				control = { province = 1188 data = JAP }
				control = { province = 1187 data = JAP }
				control = { province = 1186 data = JAP }
				control = { province = 1185 data = JAP }
				control = { province = 1184 data = JAP }
				control = { province = 1183 data = JAP }
				control = { province = 1182 data = JAP }
				control = { province = 1181 data = JAP }
				control = { province = 1180 data = JAP }
			}
			AND = {													# BHT1.5
				OR = {												# BHT1.5
					control = { province = 1193 data = USA }		# BHT1.5
					AND = {											# BHT1.5
						control = { province = 1322 data = USA }	# BHT1.5
						control = { province = 1323 data = USA }	# BHT1.5
					}												# BHT1.5
				}													# BHT1.5
				control = { province = 1390 data = SOV }			# BHT1.5
				control = { province = 1389 data = SOV }			# BHT1.5
				control = { province = 1379 data = SOV }			# BHT1.5
				control = { province = 1201 data = SOV }			# BHT1.5
			}														# BHT1.5
		}
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1939 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 99
		name = EVT_43_ACTA
		command = { type = trigger which = 3729 } # BHT1.5
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = EVT_43_ACTB
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = democratic value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 44 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 45 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 3407 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 135 } # BHT1.5
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 136 } # BHT1.5
	}
}

#########################################################################
# Manchuria to Mao
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 3812
	random = no
	country = SOV

	trigger = {
#		event = 44 # BHT1.5 撤销
		OR = {
			event = 44 # Japan already surrendered
			NOT = {
				exists = JAP
			}
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_3812_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3812_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "China_CW"

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1939 }
	offset = 7
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_3812_ACTA" #
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 1389 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 1390 value = -6 }
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 1379 value = -6 }
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 1372 value = 8 }
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 1368 value = 3 }
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 1525 value = 6 }

		# BHT1.5 重写
		# 热河
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = CHC value = 2880 }	
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = CHC value = 2883 }

#  China offers Guangxi Clique peace (Edited by 兰々)

event = {
#	id = 27008
	id = 999
	random = no
#	country = CHI # BHT1.5 撤销
	country = cgx # BHT1.5

	trigger = {
#		event = 27005 # BHT1.5 撤销
		event = 60604 # BHT1.5 两广事变――爆发
		NOT = { flag = CHI_Aggresion_Asia } # BHT1.5
		war = { country = CGX country = CHI }
		NOT = {
			war = { country = JAP country = CHI }
			war = { country = JAP country = CGX }
		}
		OR = {
			lost_national = { country = CGX value = 30 }
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					control = { province = 1258 data = CGX }	# BHT1.5 桂林
					control = { province = 1313 data = CGX }	# BHT1.5 广州
					control = { province = 1319 data = CGX }	# BHT1.5 南宁
					control = { province = 2716 data = CGX }	# BHT1.5 敌军逼近南宁
					control = { province = 2720 data = CGX }	# BHT1.5
					control = { province = 2721 data = CGX }	# BHT1.5
					control = { province = 2722 data = CGX }	# BHT1.5
					control = { province = 2723 data = CGX }	# BHT1.5
					control = { province = 2726 data = CGX }	# BHT1.5
					control = { province = 2732 data = CGX }	# BHT1.5
					control = { province = 2733 data = CGX }	# BHT1.5
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				control = { province = 1310 data = CGX }		# BHT1.5 桂林被包围
				control = { province = 2728 data = CGX }		# BHT1.5
			}
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_27008_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_27008_DESC"
	style = 0

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 7
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_27008_A"
		ai_chance = 100
#		command = { type = trigger which = 27009 } # BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = trigger which = 27008 } # BHT1.5
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "EVT_27008_B"
		ai_chance = 0
#		command = { type = setflag which = CHI_Aggresion_Asia } # BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  Xi'an Incident (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 966
	random = no
	country = CHI

	name = EVT_966_NAME
	desc = EVT_966_DESC
	picture = "chinese_incident"
	style = 0

	trigger = {
		minister = 52002 # both Chiang Kai Shek
		war = { country = CHI country = CHC }
		NOT = {
			war = { country = CHI country = JAP }
		}
	}

	date = { day = 11 month = december year = 1936 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 22 month = december year = 1999 }
	
	action_a = {
		name = "剿抚并用，以谈为主（让宋美龄赴西安谈判） "
		ai_chance = 95
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "叛军必须被消灭！ "
		ai_chance = 5
		command = { type = dissent value = 2 }
		command = { type = setflag which = XianCHI }
	}
}

		command = { type = setflag which = XianCHC }
	}

event = {
	id = 968
	random = no
	country = chi

	trigger = {
		event = 966
		NOT = { event = 90 }
		OR = {
			AND = {
				flag = XianCHI
				random = 15
			}
			AND = {
				flag = XianCHC
				random = 10
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = CHC
					minister = 52002 # both Chiang Kai Shek
				}
			}
		}
	}

	date = { day = 12 month = december year = 1936 }
	offset = 2
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1937 }

	name = EVT_968_NAME
	desc = EVT_968_DESC
	picture = "chinese_incident"
	style = 0

	action_a = {
		name = "把他们作为叛徒消灭！ "
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = -100 }
		command = { type = supplies value = -5000 }
		command = { type = sleepteam which = 1006 }			# Chiang Kai-shek
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 52002 }	# Chiang Kai-shek HOG
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 52007 }	# Chiang Kai-shek
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 52008 }	# Chiang Kai-shek		
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 52161 }	# Chiang Kai-shek

	id = 90

#########################################################################
#  Forging the Unified Front (Edited by 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 91
	country = CHI
	random = no

	trigger = {
		lost_national = { country = CHI value = 15 }
		war = { country = jap country = chi }
		OR = {
			war = { country = CHI country = JAP }
			war = { country = CHC country = JAP }
			war = { country = CSX country = JAP }
			war = { country = CGX country = JAP }
			war = { country = CYN country = JAP }			
			war = { country = CXB country = JAP }			
		}
		NOT = {
			alliance = { country = CHI country = JAP }
			alliance = { country = CSX country = JAP }
			alliance = { country = CHC country = JAP }
			alliance = { country = CGX country = JAP }
			alliance = { country = CYN country = JAP }
			alliance = { country = CXB country = JAP }
		}
		OR = {
			NOT = { ispuppet = CSX }
			puppet = { country = CSX country = CHI }
			puppet = { country = CSX country = CHC }
			puppet = { country = CSX country = CGX }
			puppet = { country = CSX country = CYN }
			puppet = { country = CSX country = CXB }
		}
		OR = {
			NOT = { ispuppet = CHC }
			puppet = { country = CHC country = CHI }
			puppet = { country = CHC country = CSX }
			puppet = { country = CHC country = CGX }
			puppet = { country = CHC country = CYN }
			puppet = { country = CHC country = CXB }
		}
		OR = {
			NOT = { ispuppet = CGX }
			puppet = { country = CGX country = CHI }
			puppet = { country = CGX country = CSX }
			puppet = { country = CGX country = CHC }
			puppet = { country = CGX country = CYN }
			puppet = { country = CGX country = CXB }
		}
		OR = {
			NOT = { ispuppet = CYN }
			puppet = { country = CYN country = CHI }
			puppet = { country = CYN country = CSX }
			puppet = { country = CYN country = CHC }
			puppet = { country = CYN country = CGX }
			puppet = { country = CYN country = CXB }
		}
		OR = {
			NOT = { ispuppet = CXB }
			puppet = { country = CXB country = CHI }
			puppet = { country = CXB country = CSX }
			puppet = { country = CXB country = CHC }
			puppet = { country = CXB country = CGX }
			puppet = { country = CXB country = CYN }
		}
	}

	name = EVT_91_NAME
	desc = EVT_91_DESC
	style = 0

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 14
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1942 }

	action_a = {
		name = EVT_91_ACTA
		ai_chance = 100
		command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = democratic value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = 1 }
		command = { type = peace which = CHC value = 0 }
		command = { type = peace which = CSX value = 1 } #just in case
		command = { type = peace which = CGX value = 1 } #just in case
		command = { type = peace which = CYN value = 1 } #just in case
		command = { type = peace which = CXB value = 1 } #just in case
		command = { type = peace which = SIK value = 1 } #just in case
		command = { type = peace which = U01 value = 1 } #just in case
		command = { type = peace which = U02 value = 1 } #just in case
		command = { type = relation which = CHC value = 150 }
		command = { type = alliance which = CHC }
		command = { type = access which = CHC }		
		command = { type = alliance which = CSX }
		command = { type = alliance which = CGX }
		command = { type = alliance which = CYN }
		command = { type = alliance which = CXB }
		command = { type = alliance which = SIK }
		command = { type = alliance which = U01 }
		command = { type = alliance which = U02 }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = EVT_91_ACTB
		ai_chance = 0
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = political_left value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = -1 }
		command = { type = relation which = CHC value = -100 }
		command = { type = relation which = CSX value = -150 }
		command = { type = relation which = CGX value = -100 }
	}
}

#  Marco Polo Bridge Incident (Japan, China) (Edited by 天问, 兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 20
	random = no
	country = JAP

	# Historical event July 1937
        # http://ibiblio.org/pha/monos/144/144chap2.html

	name = EVT_20_NAME
	desc = EVT_20_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "Marco_Polo"

	trigger = {
		exists = CHI
#		or = {
#			random = 20
#			day = 7
#		}
		NOT = {
			war = { country = JAP country = CHI }
			puppet = { country = JAP country = CHI }
			war = { country = JAP country = CSX }
			puppet = { country = JAP country = CSX }
			war = { country = JAP country = CGX }
			puppet = { country = JAP country = CGX }
			alliance = { country = JAP country = CHI }
			alliance = { country = JAP country = CSX }
			alliance = { country = JAP country = CGX }
			alliance = { country = CHI country = SOV }
			alliance = { country = CHI country = USA }
			alliance = { country = CHI country = ENG }
			control = { province = 1205 data = JAP }
			war = { country = JAP country = SOV }
		}
	}

	date = { day = 6 month = july year = 1937 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = august year = 1937 }

	action_a = {
		name = EVT_20_ACTA
#		ai_chance = 95	# MIH 撤销
		ai_chance = 100 # MIH
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 2 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = war which = CHI }
		command = { type = war which = CSX }
		command = { type = war which = CGX }
		command = { type = war which = CYN }
		command = { type = war which = u02 }
		command = { type = war which = CHC }
		command = { type = dissent value = -10 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 50 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = JAP value = -50 } #The DoWs above is for free
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = CHI value = -50 }
		command = { type = relation which = CSX value = -50 }
		command = { type = relation which = CGX value = -50 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 21 }
	}
	action_b = {
#		ai_chance = 5 # MIH 撤销
		ai_chance = 0 # MIH
		name = EVT_20_ACTB
		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -1 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = JAP value = -50 } #Peace, Love and Understanding
	}
}

	offset = 10

		name = EVT_86_ACTA

	}

		name = EVT_86_ACTB
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = -1 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 4104 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 4105
	random = no
	country = CHI

	name = "广州工厂内迁开始 "
	desc = "资源委员会决定，广州地区工业处于日寇海军威胁之下，所有 工业企业应撤往重庆重建，一场轰轰烈烈的大迁徙开始了。 "
	picture = "transfer"
	style = 0

	trigger = {
		atwar = yes
		event = 4104
		control = { province = 1313 data = CHI } # 广州
		control = { province = 1232 data = CHI } # 汉口
		control = { province = 1280 data = CHI } # 重庆
		or = {
		control = { province = 1307 data = CHI } # 昆明

		}

event = {
	id = 4106
	random = no
	country = CHI

	name = "太原工厂内迁开始 "
	desc = "太原在阎锡山的苦心经营上，拥有中国当时难得的较完整的重 工业、军工工业，太原工业极其重要，但设备众多，内迁也将 十分艰巨。 "
	picture = "transfer"
	style = 0

	trigger = {
		atwar = yes
		event = 4104
		OR = {
			control = { province = 1225 data = CHI } # 太原
			AND = {
				control = { province = 1225 data = CSX }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						flag = Unified_Front
						alliance = { country = CSX country = CHI }
					}
					puppet = { country = CSX country = CHI }
				}
			}
		}
		OR = {
			control = { province = 1276 data = CHI } # 兰州
			AND = {
				control = { province = 1276 data = CXB }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						flag = Unified_Front
						alliance = { country = CXB country = CHI }
					}
					puppet = { country = CXB country = CHI }
				}
			}
		}
		control = { province = 1269 data = CHI } # 西安
		OR = {
			event = 63081 # 太原会战
			land_combat = 2823 # 娘子关
			land_combat = 2824 # 忻口
			land_combat = 1225 # 太原
			NOT = {
				control = { province = 2823 data = CHI }
				control = { province = 2823 data = CSX }
			}
			NOT = {
				control = { province = 2824 data = CHI }
				control = { province = 2824 data = CSX }
			}
		}
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 10
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = EVT_86_ACTA
		ai_chance = 100
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 1225 value = -1 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 4111 value = 180 }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = EVT_86_ACTB
		ai_chance = 0
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 4111 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 4116 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 4107
	random = no
	country = CHI

	name = "长三角工厂内迁开始 "
	desc = "8月10日，行政院第324次会议即通过了首先将上海工厂 迁往内地的提案，决定由资源委员会、实业部、军政部、财政 部各派1名代表共同组成“上海工厂迁移监督委员会”，驻沪 主持相关事宜。至此，上海民族工业的内迁工作进入实施阶段 。这时，日本对上海的大规模进攻也开始了。 "
	picture = "transfer"
	style = 0

	trigger = {
		atwar = yes
		control = { province = 1235 data = CHI } # 南京
		control = { province = 1238 data = CHI } # 杭州
		control = { province = 1280 data = CHI } # 重庆
		control = { province = 1360 data = CHI } # 成都
		control = { province = 1261 data = CHI } # 怀化
		control = { province = 1232 data = CHI } # 汉口
		OR = {
			event = 63003 # 战争的扩大――上海的紧张硝烟
			land_combat = 2625 # 华东国防线
			land_combat = 2626
			land_combat = 2627
			land_combat = 1236
			land_combat = 2631

				}
			}
		}

	id = 83
	random = no
	country = CHI

	name = EVT_83_NAME
	desc = EVT_83_DESC
	picture = "assistance"
	style = 0

	# Triggered by Soviet event 82

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 99
		name = EVT_83_ACTA
#		command = { type = construct which = air_base where = 1360 value = 1 }								# BHT1.5剧本已有机场，撤销
		command = { type = add_corps which = "第1志愿飞行队 " value = air where = 1360 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "ZETh征第一歼击航空师 " value = interceptor when = 1 }	# BHT1.5
		command = { type = add_division which = "ZETh征第二歼击航空师 " value = interceptor when = 1 }	# BHT1.5
#		command = { type = add_division which = "歼击航空师 " value = interceptor when = 0 }				# BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = add_corps which = "第2志愿飞行队 " value = air where = 1360 }

		command = { type = manpowerpool value = -30 }														# BHT1.5
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = 10 }
		command = { type = supplies value = 1000 }
		command = { type = non_aggression which = SOV where = CHI }
		command = { type = wakeleader which = 50377 }
		command = { type = add_corps which = "zetK械整" value = land where = 1360 }
		command = { type = activate_division which = 22000 value = 585 where = 1360 }
		command = { type = activate_division which = 22000 value = 586 where = 1360 }
		command = { type = activate_division which = 22000 value = 587 where = 1360 }
		command = { type = activate_division which = 22000 value = 588 where = 1360 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 831 }															# BHT1.5
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = EVT_83_ACTB
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = -1 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  The Burma Road (Edited by MIH&BHT teams)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 960
	random = no
	country = CHI
	persistent = yes
	style = 0

	trigger = {
		event = 40810 #滇缅公路完成
		NOT = { flag = BurmaRoadOpen }

		war = { country = JAP country = CHI }
		NOT = { war = { country = ENG country = CHI } }
		OR = {
			war = { country = JAP country = ENG }
			AND = {
				war = { country = JAP country = USA }
				NOT = { war = { country = ENG country = USA } }
			}
		}
		control = { province = 1299 data = ENG } #仰光
		control = { province = 1298 data = ENG } #勃生
		control = { province = 1300 data = ENG } #卑谬
		control = { province = 1296 data = ENG } #曼德勒
		control = { province = 1295 data = ENG } #腊戌
		control = { province = 1301 data = ENG } #东固
		OR = {
			#与云南和平
			AND = {
				NOT = { war = { country = CHI country = CYN } }
				OR = {
					control = { province = 1294 data = CYN } #保山
					control = { province = 1294 data = CHI } #保山
				}
				OR = {
					control = { province = 1293 data = CYN } #下关
					control = { province = 1293 data = CHI } #下关
				}
#				OR = {												# BHT1.5 撤销
#					control = { province = 1305 data = CYN } #景洪	# BHT1.5 撤销
#					control = { province = 1305 data = CHI } #景洪	# BHT1.5 撤销
#				}													# BHT1.5 撤销
				OR = {	
					control = { province = 1307 data = CYN } #昆明
					control = { province = 1307 data = CHI } #昆明
				}
				OR = {	
					control = { province = 2753 data = CYN } # BHT1.5
					control = { province = 2753 data = CHI } # BHT1.5
				}
				OR = {	
					control = { province = 2763 data = CYN } # BHT1.5
					control = { province = 2763 data = CHI } # BHT1.5
				}
			}
			#与云南交战
			AND = {
				war = { country = CHI country = CYN }
				OR = {
					control = { province = 1294 data = CHI } #保山
					control = { province = 1305 data = CHI } #景洪
				}
				control = { province = 1307 data = CHI } #昆明
			}
		}
	}

	date = { year = 1936 month = january day = 1 }
	offset = 10
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	name = "EVT_960_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_960_DESC"

	action_a = {
		name = "这是我们的生命线 "
		command = { type = free_metal value = 7 }
		command = { type = free_energy value = 14 }
		command = { type = free_rare_materials value = 4 }
		command = { type = free_oil value = 2 } #运输石油 (by 天问)
		command = { type = free_supplies value = 30 }  #运输补给 (by civdemof)
		command = { type = setflag which = BurmaRoadOpen }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 961
	random = no
	country = CHI
	persistent = yes
	style = 0

	trigger = {
		flag = BurmaRoadOpen

		NOT = {	#960之条件#	
			AND = {	
				war = { country = JAP country = CHI }
				NOT = { war = { country = ENG country = CHI }	}
				OR = {
					war = { country = JAP country = ENG }
					AND = {
						war = { country = JAP country = USA }
						NOT = { war = { country = ENG country = USA } }
					}
				}
				control = { province = 1299 data = ENG } #仰光
				control = { province = 1298 data = ENG } #勃生
				control = { province = 1300 data = ENG } #卑谬
				control = { province = 1296 data = ENG } #曼德勒
				control = { province = 1295 data = ENG } #腊戌
				control = { province = 1301 data = ENG } #东固
				OR = {
					#与云南和平
					AND = {
						NOT = { war = { country = CHI country = CYN } }
						OR = {
							control = { province = 1294 data = CYN } #保山
							control = { province = 1294 data = CHI } #保山
						}
						OR = {
							control = { province = 1293 data = CYN } #下关
							control = { province = 1293 data = CHI } #下关
						}
#						OR = {												# BHT1.5 撤销
#							control = { province = 1305 data = CYN } #景洪	# BHT1.5 撤销
#							control = { province = 1305 data = CHI } #景洪	# BHT1.5 撤销
#						}													# BHT1.5 撤销
						OR = {	
							control = { province = 1307 data = CYN } #昆明
							control = { province = 1307 data = CHI } #昆明
						}
						OR = {	
							control = { province = 2753 data = CYN } # BHT1.5
							control = { province = 2753 data = CHI } # BHT1.5
						}
						OR = {	
							control = { province = 2763 data = CYN } # BHT1.5
							control = { province = 2763 data = CHI } # BHT1.5
						}
					}
					#与云南交战
					AND = {
						war = { country = CHI country = CYN }
						OR = {
							control = { province = 1294 data = CHI } #保山
							control = { province = 1305 data = CHI } #景洪
						}
						control = { province = 1307 data = CHI } #昆明
					}
				}
			} #AND结束
		} #NOT结束
	}

	date = { year = 1936 month = january day = 1 }
	offset = 10
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	name = "EVT_961_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_961_DESC"

	action_a = {
		name = "真是不幸的消息 "
		command = { type = free_metal value = -7 }
		command = { type = free_energy value = -14 }
		command = { type = free_rare_materials value = -4 }
		command = { type = free_oil value = -2 }
		command = { type = free_supplies value = -30 }
		command = { type = clrflag which = BurmaRoadOpen }
	}
}

#  Surrender events - Japan surrenders to China (Edited by 天问&兰々)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 3823
	random = no
	country = CHI

	name = "EVT_3823_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3823_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "chanfukeng"

	trigger = {
		areacontrol = { province = 1390 data = chi } # Changchun			# BHT1.5
		areacontrol = { province = 1389 data = chi } # Mukden
		areacontrol = { province = 1379 data = chi } # Harbin
#		control = { province = 1201 data = chi } # Pyongyang			# BHT1.5 撤销
#		control = { province = 1199 data = chi } # Seoul				# BHT1.5 撤销
#		control = { province = 1196 data = chi } # Busan				# BHT1.5 撤销
		NOT = {
			areacontrol = { province = 1201 data = JAP } # Pyongyang		# BHT1.5
			areacontrol = { province = 1199 data = JAP } # Seoul			# BHT1.5
			areacontrol = { province = 1196 data = JAP } # Busan			# BHT1.5
		}
		areacontrol = { province = 1235 data = CHI } # Nanjing
		areacontrol = { province = 1205 data = -3 } # Beiping				# BHT1.5 撤销
		areacontrol = { province = 1237 data = CHI } # 上海
		not = { areacontrol = { province = 1313 data = JAP } } # 广州
		war = { country = CHI country = JAP }
    not = { 
      big_alliance = { country = jap alliance = allies }  	
      big_alliance = { country = jap alliance = comintern }        
      }      	
		not = {
			exists = u87												# BHT
			exists = u74												# BHT
			exists = u03												# BHT 防止日本放PRC的BUG
		}
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 10
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 100
		name = "EVT_3823_ACTA" #
		command = { type = dissent value = -20 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 2411 } # CHC version
		command = { type = inherit which = u74 }
		command = { type = inherit which = u87 }		
		command = { type = inherit which = MAN }
		command = { type = inherit which = MEN }		
		command = { type = trigger which = 3824 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 0
		name = "EVT_3823_ACTB" #
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 3824 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 3827
	random = no
	country = CHI

	name = "EVT_3827_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3827_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "Nomonhan"

	trigger = {
		event = 2625 # The Bitter Peace - Japan is not Axis
		alliance = { country = CHI country = GER }
		NOT = {
			alliance = { country = JAP country = GER }
		}
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 100
		name = "EVT_3826_ACTA" #
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 }
		command = { type = inherit which = MON }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 2411
	random = no
	country = CHC

	name = "EVT_3823_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3823_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "chanfukeng"

	trigger = {
		areacontrol = { province = 1390 data = CHC } # Changchun			# BHT1.5
		areacontrol = { province = 1389 data = CHC } # Mukden
		areacontrol = { province = 1379 data = CHC } # Harbin
		OR = {
			areacontrol = { province = 1235 data = CHI } # Nanjing
			areacontrol = { province = 1235 data = CHC } # Nanjing
		}
		areacontrol = { province = 1205 data = -3 } # Beiping				
		NOT = {
			areacontrol = { province = 1201 data = JAP } # Pyongyang
			areacontrol = { province = 1199 data = JAP } # Seoul
			areacontrol = { province = 1196 data = JAP } # Busan
		}
		or = {
			areacontrol = { province = 1237 data = CHI } # 上海
			areacontrol = { province = 1237 data = CHC } # 上海
		}
		not = { areacontrol = { province = 1313 data = JAP } } # 广州
		war = { country = CHC country = JAP }
		not = { 
		  big_alliance = { country = jap alliance = allies } 
		  big_alliance = { country = jap alliance = comintern } 		  
		  }
		not = {
			exists = u87												# BHT
			exists = u74												# BHT
			exists = u03												# BHT 防止日本放PRC的BUG
		}
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 10
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

		ai_chance = 100

		command = { type = inherit which = u74 }

}

		command = { type = non_aggression which = JAP where = CHC }

#########################################################################
#  Siam Events
#########################################################################
#  Siam Gives Up
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 3813
	random = no
	country = SIA

	trigger = {
		war = { country = SIA country = ENG }
		OR = {
			event = 43 # Japan already surrendered
			NOT = { exists = JAP }
			AND = {
				OR = {
					control = { province = 1343 data = ENG }
					control = { province = 1343 data = FRA }
					control = { province = 1343 data = AST }
					control = { province = 1343 data = NZL }
					control = { province = 1343 data = USA }
				}
				OR = {
					control = { province = 1345 data = ENG }
					control = { province = 1345 data = FRA }
					control = { province = 1345 data = AST }
					control = { province = 1345 data = NZL }
					control = { province = 1345 data = USA }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_3813_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_3813_DESC"
	style = 0
	picture = "JAP_surrender"

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1939 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_3813_ACTA" #
		command = { type = end_puppet }
		command = { type = leave_alliance }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = FRA value = 1339 }	# Indochina
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = FRA value = 1340 }	# Indochina
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = FRA value = 1341 }	# Indochina
		command = { type = peace_with_all which = SIA }					# BHT1.5
		command = { type = access_to_alliance which = allies }			# BHT1.5
		command = { type = access_to_alliance which = comintern }		# BHT1.5
#		command = { type = peace which = USA value = 1 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = SAF value = 1 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = CAN value = 1 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = AST value = 1 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = FRA value = 1 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = NZL value = 1 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = ENG value = 1 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = SOV value = 1 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = CHI value = 1 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = CHC value = 1 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = SIK value = 1 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = PHI value = 1 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = LIB value = 1 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
#		command = { type = peace which = PAN value = 1 }	# BHT1.5 撤销
		command = { type = access which = USA }				
		command = { type = access which = ENG }				
		command = { type = access which = FRA }				
 	  command = { type = access which = CAN }				
		command = { type = access which = AST }				
		command = { type = access which = NZL }				
		command = { type = access which = SAF }				
		command = { type = access which = PAN } #was ITA	
		command = { type = access which = SOV }				
		command = { type = access which = CHI }				
		command = { type = access which = CGX }				
		command = { type = access which = CYN }				
	}
}

		}

#########################################################################
#  South America Events
#########################################################################
#  War between Peru and Ecuador
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 96
	random = no
	country = PRU

	name = EVT_96_NAME
	desc = EVT_96_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "PRU_ECU2"

	trigger = {
		exists = ECU
		control = { province = 818 data = ECU } #Iquitos
		NOT = {
			war = { country = ECU country = PRU }
		}
		random = 25
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = july year = 1941 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1943 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 99
		name = EVT_96_ACTA
		command = { type = money value = 5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 2 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 97 }
	}

	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = EVT_96_ACTB
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = -2 }
		command = { type = war which = ECU }
		command = { type = trigger which = 98 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 97
	random = no
	country = ECU

	name = EVT_97_NAME
	desc = EVT_97_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "PRU_ECU2"

	# Triggered by PER event 96

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 99
		name = EVT_97_ACTA
		command = { type = dissent value = 2 }
		command = { type = money value = -15 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = PRU value = 818 } #Iquitos
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 98 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = EVT_97_ACTB
		command = { type = war which = PRU }
		command = { type = dissent value = -20 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = -1 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 98 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 98
	random = no
	country = COL

	name = EVT_98_NAME
	desc = EVT_98_DESC
	style = 0
	picture = "PRU_ECU2"

	# Triggered by PER event 96

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 99
		name = EVT_98_ACTA
		command = { type = money value = -10 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = -1 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = EVT_98_ACTB
		command = { type = money value = 10 }
		command = { type = alliance which = ECU }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  The Independance of CAMBODIA (puppet at first!)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 104
	random = no
	country = FRA

	trigger = {
		government = democratic
		random = 8 # 8% chance every month
		control = { province = 1340 data = FRA } # Phnom Phen
		atwar = no
		NOT = {
			exists = CMB
			exists = GER
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_123_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_123_DESC"
	picture = "cambodia"
	style = 0

	date = { day = 1 month = july year = 1945 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_123_ACTA"
		ai_chance = 97
		command = { type = independence which = CMB value = 1 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 105 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 132 }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "EVT_123_ACTB"
		ai_chance = 3
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
#  The Independance of ISRAEL (Edited by 天问)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 110
	random = no
	country = ENG

	trigger = {
		government = democratic
		random = 8 # 8% chance every month
		control = { province = 1798 data = ENG } #
		atwar = no
		NOT = {
			exists = ISR
			exists = GER
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_129_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_129_DESC"
	picture = "israel"
	style = 0

	date = { day = 1 month = may year = 1948 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_129_ACTA"
		ai_chance = 90
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 15110 }
		command = { type = independence which = ISR value = 1 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 111 }
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "EVT_129_ACTB"
		ai_chance = 10
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
	}
}

	id = 111
	random = no
	country = ISR
	style = 0

	# triggered by ENG 110

		ai_chance = 100
		name = "EVT_900127_ACTA"
		command = { type = dissent value = -10 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 8 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 6 }
		command = { type = headofstate which = 559001 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 559002 }
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 559003 }
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 559024 }
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 559049 }
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 559050 }
		command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 559007 }
		command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 559051 }
		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 559009 }
		command = { type = chiefofair which = 559010 }

		command = { type = add_corps which = "以色列国防军 " value = land where = 1798 }
#		command = { type = add_division which = "第1步兵师 " value = infantry when = 6 where = armored_car }

		command = { type = add_division which = "第2以色列步兵师 " value = motorized when = 6 } # BHT1.5 模板

			exists = LBY
			exists = GER
			government = fascist
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_135_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_135_DESC"
	picture = "libya" #needs event picture
	style = 0

	date = { day = 24 month = december year = 1951 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "EVT_135_ACTA"
		ai_chance = 97
		command = { type = independence which = LBY value = 1 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 117 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 118 } # BHT1.5 优化检测
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 119 } # BHT1.5 优化检测
	}
	action_b = {
		name = "EVT_135_ACTB"
		ai_chance = 3
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
	}

#########################################################################
#  The reaction of the Arab States to Israeli Independence (Edited by Civdemof)
#########################################################################
event = {
	id = 120
	random = no
	country = EGY
	
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			ispuppet = EGY # Egypt is fully independent and not allied to anyone
			alliance = { country = EGY country = ENG }
			alliance = { country = EGY country = USA }
			alliance = { country = EGY country = GER }
			alliance = { country = EGY country = SOV }
		}
		OR = {
			event = 111 # Israeli Independence happened OR...
			AND = {	
				exists = ISR  # ... Israeli was set free in some other way, but is not puppet/allied (By Civdemof)
				NOT = {
					ispuppet = ISR
					alliance = { country = ISR country = ENG }	
					alliance = { country = ISR country = USA }
					alliance = { country = ISR country = GER }
					alliance = { country = ISR country = SOV }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_130_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_137_DESC"
	picture = "reinforcements"
	style = 0

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 97
		name = "EVT_137_ACTA"
		command = { type = belligerence which = EGY value = 10 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = JOR value = 150 }
 		command = { type = set_relation which = LEB value = 150 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = SYR value = 150 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = IRQ value = 100 }
		command = { type = war which = ISR }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 3
		name = "EVT_137_ACTB"
		command = { type = set_relation which = JOR value = -50 }
 		command = { type = set_relation which = LEB value = -50 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = SYR value = -50 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = IRQ value = -50 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = ISR value = 75 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = ENG value = 75 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = USA value = 75 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = FRA value = 75 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 121
	random = no
	country = JOR
	
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			ispuppet = JOR # Jordan is fully independent and not allied to anyone
			alliance = { country = JOR country = ENG }
			alliance = { country = JOR country = USA }
			alliance = { country = JOR country = GER }
			alliance = { country = JOR country = SOV }
		}
		OR = {
			event = 111 # Israeli Independence happened OR...
			AND = {	
				exists = ISR # ... Israeli was set free in some other way, but is not puppet/allied
				NOT = {
					ispuppet = ISR
					alliance = { country = ISR country = ENG }	
					alliance = { country = ISR country = USA }
					alliance = { country = ISR country = GER }
					alliance = { country = ISR country = SOV }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_130_NAME"

event = {
	id = 122
	random = no
	country = LEB
	
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			ispuppet = LEB # Lebanon is fully independent and not allied to anyone
			alliance = { country = LEB country = ENG }
			alliance = { country = LEB country = USA }
			alliance = { country = LEB country = GER }
			alliance = { country = LEB country = SOV }
		}
		OR = {
			event = 111 # Israeli Independence happened OR...
			AND = {	
				exists = ISR # ... Israeli was set free in some other way, but is not puppet/allied
				NOT = {
					ispuppet = ISR
					alliance = { country = ISR country = ENG }	
					alliance = { country = ISR country = USA }
					alliance = { country = ISR country = GER }
					alliance = { country = ISR country = SOV }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	name = "EVT_130_NAME"
	desc = "EVT_137_DESC"
	picture = "reinforcements"
	style = 0

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 97
		name = "EVT_137_ACTA"
		command = { type = belligerence which = LEB value = 10 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = EGY value = 150 }
 		command = { type = set_relation which = JOR value = 150 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = SYR value = 150 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = IRQ value = 100 }
		command = { type = war which = ISR }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 3
		name = "EVT_137_ACTB"
		command = { type = set_relation which = EGY value = -50 }
 		command = { type = set_relation which = JOR value = -50 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = SYR value = -50 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = IRQ value = -50 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = ISR value = 75 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = ENG value = 75 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = USA value = 75 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = FRA value = 75 }
	}
}

	id = 123
	random = no
	country = SYR

		NOT = {
			ispuppet = SYR # Syria is fully independent and not allied to anyone
			alliance = { country = SYR country = ENG }
			alliance = { country = SYR country = USA }
			alliance = { country = SYR country = GER }
			alliance = { country = SYR country = SOV }
		}
		OR = {
			event = 111 # Israeli Independence happened OR...

				exists = ISR # ... Israeli was set free in some other way, but is not puppet/allied

					ispuppet = ISR

					alliance = { country = ISR country = USA }
					alliance = { country = ISR country = GER }

				}
			}
		}
	}

event = {
	id = 137
	random = no
	country = USA

	trigger = {
		random = 25
		event = 39
		NOT = {
			event = 69 # Cold War gets hot
			war = { country = SOV country = USA }
			exists = AUS
		}
	}

	name = "奥地利获得独立 "
	desc = "击败法西斯势力后，同盟国军事占领奥地利，直到奥地利国家条 约签订为止。在宣布成为永久中立国之后，占领军撤军，奥地利 获得独立。 "
	picture = "eastern_europe"
	style = 0

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ok"
		command = { type = independence which = AUS value = 1 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 138 }
	}
}

	id = 138
	random = no
	country = ENG

	name = "奥地利获得独立 "
	desc = "击败法西斯势力后，同盟国军事占领奥地利，直到奥地利国家条 约签订为止。在宣布成为永久中立国之后，占领军撤军，奥地利 获得独立。 "
	picture = "eastern_europe"
	style = 0

	action_a = {
		name = "ok"
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = AUS value = 373 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = AUS value = 377 }

event = {
	id = 139
	random = no
	country = FRA

	name = "奥地利获得独立 "
	desc = "击败法西斯势力后，同盟国军事占领奥地利，直到奥地利国家条 约签订为止。在宣布成为永久中立国之后，占领军撤军，奥地利 获得独立。 "
	picture = "eastern_europe"
	style = 0

	action_a = {
		name = "ok"
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = AUS value = 373 }

	id = 141
	random = no
	country = AUS

	name = "奥地利获得独立 "
	desc = "击败法西斯势力后，同盟国军事占领奥地利，直到奥地利国家条 约签订为止。在宣布成为永久中立国之后，占领军撤军，奥地利 获得独立。 "
	picture = "eastern_europe"
	style = 0

	action_a = {
		name = "ok"
		command = { type = capital which = 463 }
		command = { type = end_puppet }
		command = { type = leave_alliance }
		command = { type = end_access which = USA }
		command = { type = end_access which = ENG }
		command = { type = end_access which = FRA }
		command = { type = end_access which = SOV }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 142
	random = no
	country = USA

	trigger = {
		random = 25
		event = 39
		NOT = {
			event = 69 # Cold War gets hot
			war = { country = SOV country = USA }
			exists = DFR
			exists = GER
		}
	}

	name = EVT_9341_NAME
	desc = EVT_9341_DESC
	picture = "eastern_europe"
	style = 0

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ok"
		command = { type = independence which = DFR value = 1 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 143 value = 1 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 147
	random = no
	country = SOV

	trigger = {
		random = 50
		event = 142
		NOT = {
			event = 69 # Cold War gets hot
			war = { country = SOV country = USA }
			exists = DDR
			exists = GER
		}
	}

	name = "德意志民主共和国的建立 "
	desc = "由于理念上的差异，在战后以美国为主的西方阵营与以苏联为主 的共产阵营逐渐疏远。针对西方盟国在德国西部建立一个政权的 行动，苏联宣布其将着手建立一个东德政权。 "
	picture = "eastern_europe"
	style = 0

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ok"
		command = { type = independence which = DDR value = 1 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 148 value = 1 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 148
	random = no
	country = SOV

	name = "德意志民主共和国的建立 "
	desc = "由于理念上的差异，在战后以美国为主的西方阵营与以苏联为主 的共产阵营逐渐疏远。针对西方盟国在德国西部建立一个政权的 行动，苏联宣布其将着手建立一个东德政权。 "
	picture = "eastern_europe"
	style = 0

	action_a = {
		name = "ok"

	id = 149
	random = no
	country = DDR

	desc = "由于理念上的差异，在战后以美国为主的西方阵营与以苏联为主 的共产阵营逐渐疏远。针对西方盟国在德国西部建立一个政权的 行动，苏联宣布其将着手建立一个东德政权。 "
	picture = "eastern_europe"
	style = 0

		name = "ok"
